episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Singing:)Oh, I can see what others can't seeIt ain't some sideshow trick, it's innate abilityWhere others are blind, I am futurely inclinedAnd you too could see, if you was widdle ol' me!Come on, everybody, rise up! I want y'all to keep it going!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Crowd, including Soos and the twins, rises, seemingly unintentionally, and they start to clap along with the beat.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Wha—? How did he—?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Keep it going!(Singing:)You wish your son would call you more

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Momentarily cut to an oldwomanwith a cat on her lap.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: I'm leaving everything to my cats!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Meows)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Singing:)I sense that you've been here before.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Momentarily cut toSheriff Blubs, who is wearing a shirt with Gideon's face on it and holding various other Li'l Gideon merchandise.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Oh, what gave it away?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Cut to Dipper, Soos and Mabel.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Exasperated)Come on.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Singing; to Mabel)I'll read your mind if I'm ableSomething tells me you're named Mabel

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Gideon leaves, and Mabel faces the screen and moves the popcorn out of the way so that we can see her sweater, which reads "MABEL."

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: How'd he do that?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Singing)So welcome all ye... to the Tent of TelepathyAnd thanks for visiting...widdle ol' me!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: The song ends, Gideon is sweating and panting and the crowd cheers wildly.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Pants)Oh... oh my goodness.(Drinks some water; to the audience)Thank you! You people are the real miracles!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Woo! Yeah!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (As they exit)Man, that kid's an even bigger fraud than Stan! No wonder our uncle's jealous.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Oh, come on. His dance moves were adorable! And did you see his hair? It was like, whoosh!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: You're too easily impressed.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Yeah, yeah!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Next day at the Mystery Shack. Mabel goes up to Dipper, her face is bedazzled with sequins.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Check it out, Dipper! I successfully bezazzled my face! Blink!(She blinks as she says this and some of the sequins fly off her face)Ow.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Is that permanent?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: I'm unappreciated in my time...

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: The doorbell rings.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Somebody answer that door!!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: I'll get it!(Goes to get the door. She opens it up but there thinks is no one there. Mabel then looks down and finds Gideon)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Howdy.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: It's "wittle ol'" you!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Laughs nervously)Yeah, my song's quite catchy. I know we haven't formally met, but after yesterday's performance, I just couldn't get your laugh out of my head.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: You mean this one?(Laughs obnoxiously)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Oh, what a delight! When I saw you in the audience, I said to myself, "Now there's a kindred spirit! Someone who appreciates the sparkly things in life."

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: That's totally me!(Laughs and coughs up some sequins that land on Gideon's suit, bedazzling it)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (In a whisper)Enchanting. Utterly enchanting.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Offscreen)Who's at the door?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: No one, Grunkle Stan!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: I appreciate your discretion. Now, Stan's no fan of mine. I don't know how a lemon so sour could be related to a peach so sweet.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Gideon! Aha ha!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: What do you say we step away from here, and chat a bit more. Perhaps in my dressing room?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Oh! Makeovers. Yahoo!(Pokes Gideon's stomach)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Laughs)Ow.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Cut to inside Gideon's house. Gideon opens the door to his dressing room. Mabel stares in amazement.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Ya see something you like? 'Cause I do.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Laughs; cluelessly)What?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Mabel returns to the Mystery Shack with her makeover.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Hey Dipper. What's goin' oooon?(Dangles manicured fingernails over Dipper's head)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Whoa, where have you been? And what's going on with those fingernails, you look like a wolverine.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: I know, right?(Roars, pretends to scratch something)I was hanging out with my new pal, Gideon. He is one dapper little man.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Mabel, I don't trust anyone whose hair is bigger than their head.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Oh, leave him alone! You never want to do girly stuff with me; you and Soos get to do boy stuff all the time!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: What do you mean?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Enters)Hey dude, you ready to blow up these hot dogs in the microwave one by one?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Excitedly:)Am I!(They both run off while Mabel stands there)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Offscreen, as popping sounds are made, they are heard laughing)(Chanting:)One-at-a-time! One-at-a-time!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Cut to Mabel and Gideon on the roof of awarehouse.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Whoa, the view from your family's factory is nuts! Good thing we both brought our—

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: —Opera glasses!(Point their opera glasses at each other and laugh)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Mabel, when I'm up here lookin' down on all them little ol' people, I feel like I'm king of all I survey. I guess that makes you my queen!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: What? You are being so nice to me right now, quit it!(smacks him in the stomach)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: I can't quit it. I am speaking from the heart.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: From the where-now?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Mabel, I've never felt this close with anyone. So, so close.(Strokes Mabel's hair and giggles)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Pushes his hand away)Look Gideon, I um...

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Reaches to pet Mabel's hair again and giggles)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Pushes his hand away)I like you a lot, but let's just be friends.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: At least just give me a chance. Mabel, will you do me the honor of going on a date with me?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: A play date?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Shakes head)Mmnn.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: A shopping date?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Mmnn. It'll just be one li'l ol' date, I swear on my lucky bolo tie.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Ummm. Okay, then... I guess...

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Mabel Pines, you have made me the happiest boy in the world!(Hugs Mabel)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Are you sniffing my hair?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Cut to commercial break.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Back at Mystery Shack, Mabel and Dipper are playing a video game.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: It's not a date-date, it's just, you know, I didn't want to hurt his feelings and so I figured I'd throw him a bone.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Mabel, guys don't work that way. He's gonna fall in love with you.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Scoffs)Yeah right. I'm notthatlovable.(Shoots Dipper in the game)Kaboom! Yes!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Okay, we agree on something here.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Doorbell rings, Mabel goes to answer door. A horse busts through.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Screams)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Riding horse)A night of enchantment awaits, m'lady!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Oh boy.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Cut to anaquatic themed restaurant, and then to the interior. Mabel and Gideon are sitting together at a booth.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: I can't believe they let us bring a horse in here!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Well, people have a hard time sayingnoto me.(Puts feet up on table)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Ah, Monsieur Gideon! Ze feet on ze table! An excellent choice!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Jean Luc, what did we discuss about eye contact?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Looking away)Yes, yes, very good!(Backs away)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: I've never seen so many forks! And water with bubbles in it?Ooh lala, oui, oui!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Oh!Parlez vous francais?!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: ...I have no idea what you're saying.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Cut to the Mystery Shack gift shop, where Stan is looking at a newspaper article showing a picture of Gideon and Mabel together.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Hey, hey! What the jackal is Mabel doing in the paper next to that crazy pickpocket Gideon?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Oh, yeah, it's like a big deal. Everybody's talking about Gideon and Mabel's big date tonight.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: WHAT?! That little shyster is dating my great niece!?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: I wonder what the new name will be for the power couple. Mabideon? Gideabel?(Gasps)Magidbeleon!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Exits)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: I didn't know! I didn't hear about it and plus, I told her not to.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Re-enters, wearing his suit)Yeah, well it ends tonight. I'm going right down to that little skunk's house; this is gonna stop RIGHT now!(Slams door)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Dude, wouldn't it be funny if that was a closet, and he had to come back out again and go out the real door?(Opens the door)Nope. Real door.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Stan's car skids to a halt in front of Gideon's house. He drives hiscarup to Gideon's house and skids to a halt in front.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (He knocks the door) Gideon, you little punk! Open up!(He reads sign on the door that says "Pardon This Garden")I will pardon NOTHING!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Opens the door)Why, Stanford Pines! What a delight!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Out of the way Bud, I'm looking for Gideon!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Well, I haven't seen the boy around, but since you're here, you simplymustcome in for coffee!(Pulls Stan inside)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: But-but I came-

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: It's imported! All the way from Colombia!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Wow... I went to jail there once.(Whistles)Some digs you got here.(Sees clown painting)Oh, this. This is beautiful.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Now, I hear your niece and my Gideon are, well, they're singin' in harmony lately so to speak!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Uh, yeah, and I'm against it. Nyah.(Knocks a pillow off the couch)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: No no no. I see it as a fantastic business opportunity. Yes, the Mystery Shack and the Tent of Telepathy. We've been at each other's throats for far too- lemme get that.(Rips down a picture of Stan on a dart board)We've been at each other's throats for far too long, yes we have. This is our big chance to brush aside our rivalry and pool our collective profits, you see.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Clicks a cash register)I'm listening.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Cut back to Gideon and Mabel in The Club.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: ...And so I said "Autograph your own head shot lady."(Laughs)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Nervously laughs)Yeah...(The lobster on her plate pinches her fork)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Mabel, tonight's date was a complete success. And tomorrow's date promises to top this one in every way!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Whoa whoa, you said justonedate, and this was it.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Hark! What a surprise! A red crested South American rainbow macaw!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Flies in and lands on Gideon)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Screams and grabs the lobster)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: ...two three four...

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: MABEL! WILL YOU- ACCOMPANY- GIDEON- TO- THE BALLROOM DANCE- THIS- THURBDAY.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Shakes it violently)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: THURSDAY!(Coughs up a letter and flies away)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Oh, so adorable.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Gideon's got a girlfriend.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: They're expectin' us. Please say you'll go.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Oh, Gideon, I'm sorry, but I'm gonna have to say-

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: I'm on the edge of my seat.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: This is gonna be adorable.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: If she says no, I'll die from sadness.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: I can verify that that will indeed happen.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: People chattering.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Cut back to the Shack. Mabel walks by Dipper as he's reading his book.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Hey. How'd it go?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: I don't know...(Puts lobster in tank)I have a lobster now.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Well, at least it's over and you won't ever have to go out with him again.(Pause)Mabel? It's over, right? Mabel?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: BLAARRGG!(Flails arms)He asked me out again and I didn't know how to say no.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Like this: no.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: It's not that easy, Dipper! And I do like Gideon, as a friend slash little sister, so I didn't want to hurt his feelings! I just need to get things back to where they used to be. You know, friends.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Out at night in the middle of the lake.Old Man McGucketis rowing a boat with Gideon and Mabel in it.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Boat in the night! Boat in the night!(Laughs)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Hah, you know I thought dancing was gonna be the end of the evening, right?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Leans in)Don't you want this evenin' to last, my sweet?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Recoils)NO! I mean yes. I mean I'm always happy to hang out with a friend, buddy, pal, chum, other word for friend...

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Pal?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: I already said pal, uh, mate?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: How aboutsoul mate?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Fireworks appear that show the name "Mabel" within a heart.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Well, you can't say no to that.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Cut back to the Shack, where Mabel is pacing.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: ..I mean, he's so nice, but.. I can't keep doing this. But I can't break his heart.(Shouts)I have no way out!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Enters)What in the heck happened on that date?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: I don't know! I was in the friend zone, and then before I knew what was happening, he pulled me into the romance zone. It was like quick sand! Chubby quicksand!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Mabel, come on. It's not like you're gonna have to marry Gideon.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Enters)Great news, Mabel. You have to marry Gideon!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: WHAT?!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: It's all part of my long term deal with Buddy Gleeful. There's a lot of cash tied up in this thing. Plus I got this shirt.(Gestures to his "Team Gideon" shirt)Ugh, I am fat.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Screams and runs out of the room)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Calling after her:)Bodies change, honey! Bodies change...

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Walks into the attic and seeing Mabel hiding in her sweater)Oh no. Mabel...

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Mabel's not here. She's in sweater town.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Are you gonna comeoutof sweater town?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Whines and shakes head)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Alright, enough is enough. If you can't break up with Gideon, I'll do it for you.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Peeks out of her sweater)You will?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Nods)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Playfully punches and hugs Dipper)Oh, thank you thank you thank you!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Alright.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Cut toThe Club, where Gideon is sitting in a booth awaiting Mabel. Dipper enters, approaches Gideon and clears his throat.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Oh. Dipper Pines, how are you? You look good, you look good.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Thanks, you uh... Look, Gideon. We've got to talk. Mabel isn't joining you tonight, she uh, she doesn't want to see you anymore.(Laughs nervously)She's uh. She's kinda weirded out by you, no offense.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Eye twitches)So what you're sayin' is... you've...come between us.(Eye twitches again)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: You're not gonna like, freak out or anything, are ya?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Of course not. These things happen. Bygones, you know.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: So. Okay. Cool. Then again, sorry man, but uh, hey, thumbs up. Huh?(Backs away)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (In a whisper:)Thumbs up indeed, my friend.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Cut to the exterior of the restaurant, where Mabel is waiting for Dipper, who then exits the restaurant.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: How'd it go? Was he mad? Did he try to read your mind with his psychic powers?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Don't worry, Mabel, he's just a kid. He doesn't have any powers.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Cut to Gideon's bedroom later on.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Breathing heavily)Dipper Pines, you don't know what you've done!(Grabs hisamuletand a candle starts to levitate and the light bulbs on his boudoir explode. Other things in the room begin to levitate)You've just made the biggest mistake of your life!(Throws the levitated objects on the ground)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Opening the door)Gideon Charles Gleeful, clean up your room this instant!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: I CAN BUY AND SELL YOU, OLD MAN!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: ...Fair enough.(Closes door)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Gideon looks at a picture of Dipper and Mabel and burns away Dipper's side of the picture.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Cut to Soos and the twins outside. Soos tucks a pillow under his shirt.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Hit me, dude!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: The twins charge at Soos' stomach and bounce off, laughing.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Feels good.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: I'm so glad everything's back to normal!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Telephone rings.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Your turn.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Finishing the sentence about a second after Mabel)Your turn. Aw, man...(Answers phone)Hello?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Over the phone)Toby Determined,Gravity Falls Gossiper.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Oh hey man. Sorry foraccusing you of murderlast week.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Water under the bridge! Say, we want to interview you about whether you've seen anything unUSUAL in this hereTOWNsince you've arrived.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Oh, finally! I thought nobody would ever ask! I have notes and theories!(Listening)Uh huh, uh huh.(Writing as Toby tells him the address)412 Gopher Road. Tonight? Got it.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Cut to Toby Determined's residence. Toby hangs up the phone.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: There. I did your dirty work. Now it's time to pay YOUR end of the bargain!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Throws Toby a slip of paper)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Ha!Shandra Jimenez'sphone number! Bless you, Li'l Gideon!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Cut to 412 Gopher Road. Dipper opens the warehouse door.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Voice echoing:)Hello?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Dipper turns to leave, only for the door to slam shut. He bangs on the door and turns around when lights start turning on. Gideon swerves around in a swivel chair, petting a doll of himself.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Hello friend.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Ughh, Gideon.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Dipper Pines. How long have been livin' in this town? A week, two? You like it here? Enjoy the scenery?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: What do you want from me, man?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Listen carefully, boy. This town has secrets you couldn't begin to comprehend!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Is this about Mabel? I told you, she's not into you!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: LIAR! YOU turned her against me!(Grabs amulet and walks toward Dipper)She was my peach dumplin'!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Uh, you okay, man?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Levitates Dipper and throws him into a pile of merchandise)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Howdy!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Readin' minds isn't all I can do.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: But-but you're a fake.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Oh tell me, Dipper: is this fake?(Levitates all the merchandise)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Mabel outside of the Mystery Shack, thinking and chewing on her hair.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Walks outside and sits next to Mabel)How's that hair tastin', buddy?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Wendy, I need some advice. You've broken up with guys, right?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Oh yeah:Russ Durham, Eli Hall, Stoney Davidson...

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: I don't know what's wrong with me. I thought everything was back to normal, but I still feel all gross.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: ...Mike Worley, Nate Holt, oh, that guy with the tattoos...

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Maybe letting Dipper do it for me was a mistake. Gideon deserves an honest break up.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: ...Danny Feldman, Mark Epston... Oh man, I'm not sure I ever actually broke up with him. Nowonderhe keeps calling me.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: I know what I've gotta do. Thanks for talking to me, Wendy.(Runs to get a bike and rides off on it)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Takes out her ringing cell phone)Ignore.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Dipper is running away from the merchandise being thrown at him. Gideon laughs evilly and moves a cabinet to smash Dipper. Dipper jumps out of the way and hits his head on the wall.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Grunkle Stan was right about you, you ARE a monster!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Your sister will be mine!(Laughs evilly and pulls the sting of one of his dolls, making it laugh evilly)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Grabs a baseball bat and gets up)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (To the doll:)Who's a cute little guy? You are!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: No you are!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Dipper shouts and charges at Gideon with the bat. Gideon levitates Dipper and he drops the bat.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: She's never gonna date you, man!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: That's a lie.(Looks at a box of lamb shears)And I'm gonna make sure youneverlie to me again, friend.(Levitates the lamb shears)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Runs to the window from outside and sees Dipper and Gideon. Opens door)Gideon! We have to talk!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: M-Mabel. My marshmalla.(Drops the shears)What are you doin' here?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: I'm sorry Gideon, but I can't be your marshmallow. I needed to be honest and tell you that myself.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: I-I don't understand.(Squeezes the amulet, therefore squeezing Dipper in midair)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (While choking:)Uh, Mabel!? This probably isn't the best time to be brutally honest with him!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Hey, but we can still be makeover buddies, right? Wouldn't you like that?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Really?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Pulls off Gideon's amulet)No, not really!(Dipper falls)You are like, attacking my brother, what the heck?!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: My tie! Give it back!(Mabel throws the amulet to Dipper)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Ha!(Catches it)Not so powerful without this, are you?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Screams and charges at Dipper, making him drop the amulet and breaking through the window.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Dipper!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Dipper and Gideon scream. Gideon slaps Dipper and the two start slapping each other and then start screaming again. Mabel, who is holding the mystic amulet, levitates the two of them and then floats down.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Listen Gideon, it's over. I will never, ever, date you.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Yeah!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Drops them and throws the amulet to the ground, breaking it)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: MY POWERS! Oh this isn't over. This isn't the last you'll see of wittle... ol' me!(Walks into the dark forest)

line: (Finishes signing papers)Ah, this is livin', brother.(Knocks on the clown painting)

line: From now on it's all name brand foods and clown paintings.(Gideon storms in; to Gideon:)Well, hey, Gideon! Why, look who I—

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Stands on the coffee table)Stanford Pines, I rebuke thee! I rebuke thee!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Rebuke? Is that a word?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: The entire Pines' family have invoked my fury! You will all pay recompense for your transgressions!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: What, you got like a word-a-day calendar or something?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Apbap bap but-but sunshine?(Laughs nervously)What about our arrangement with Mabel and—

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: SILENCE!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Well, uh, I see he's takin' to one of hisragesagain. Eh, sorry Stan, I have to side with Gideon on this one.(Rips up the contract)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Okay, okay. I can see when I'm not wanted.(Grabs the clown painting and starts to leave)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Stan, I'm-I'm sorry but I'm gonna need that painting back! Stan? STAN!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Running away)TRY AND CATCH ME, SUCKERS!

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Cut back to the Mystery Shack, where Stan is hanging up the clown painting and the twins are a mess.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: I coulda had it all.(Looks at the twins)What the heck happened to you two?

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Gideon.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Gideon.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Gideon. Yeah, the little mutant "swore vengeance" on the whole family. Ha, I guess he's gonna try to nibble my ankles or somethin'.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Oh, yeah. Yeah, how's he gonna destroy us now, huh? Try to guess what number we're thinking of?(Laughs)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: He'llneverguess what numberI'mthinking of. NEGATIVE EIGHT! No one would guess anegativenumber.

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Laughing)

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Uh oh. He's plannin' on destruction right now!(Laughs and lays on top of the twins)

line: In Gideon's room. He's making dolls of the Pines family

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: (Playing with the Mabel doll:)Gideon, I still love you. If only my family weren't in the way.(Picks up the Stan doll and imitates Stan:)Look at me. I'm old, and I'm smelly.(Finishes the Dipper doll; mocking Dipper:)Hey, what are you gonna do without your precious amulet?(Regular voice:)Oh you'll see boy...(ClosesJournal 2)You'll see...

episode: The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
line: Cut to end credits with Dipper, Mabel and Soos. Soos is facing away from the screen and Mabel is doing something to him.

line: You done?

line: Not yet.

Opens toGompersbaaing at the rooftop of theMystery Shack; cuts toDipperandMabelin the Shack. Mabel is sitting on a spinning globe.
Mabel, do you believe inghosts?
I believe you're a big dork! Ha ha ha!
(Puts pencil against globe, making Mabel fall off)
(Enters from outside)Soos!Wendy!
(Runs up, panting) What's up, Mr. Pines!
I'm headin' out. You two are gonna wash the bathrooms, right?
Yes, sir!
Absolutely not!
Ha ha! You stay out of trouble! (Leaves)
Hey guys! What's this? (Unveils curtain) A secret ladder to the roof?
Uh, I don't think Mr. Pines would like that.
Huh?
Uhhhhh.
Huh?
You're freaking me out, dude!
Can we actually go up there?
Sure we can! Roof time! Roof time!
Roof time! Roof time!
(Looks out window) Uhhhh.
(Walk over roof to Wendy's spot)
Alright, check it out!
Woah!
Cool! Did you put all this stuff up here?
I may or may not sneak up here during work, all the time, everyday. (Throws pine cone, it hits a target on a totem pole) Yes!
Cool!
Me first!
(Throw pine cones)
(Hits a car; the car alarm goes off) (Blushes)
Jackpot! High five. (Holds up hand) ... Don't leave me hangin'.
(High five)
Oh hey, it's my friends!
(Pulls up incar, waves hand out window) Wendy!
Uh, you guys aren't gonna tell Stan about this, are you?
(Zips lips)
(Zips lips) Later dorks. (Slides down trees and gets into car)
Let's get out of here! (Drives away)
Later Wendy! Heh heh heh! Good times!
Uh, oh!
What?
(Poking Dipper) Somebody's in love!
Yeah, right! I just think Wendy's cool, okay? It's not like I lay awake at night thinking about her!
(Cut to Dipper in bed at night, wide awake)
Uh-oh.
(Cuts to theme song)
(Cuts to inside Mystery Shack)
Random dance party for no reason! (Dances)
(Dances) Go! Go! Go! Go!
(Writing:) I am pretending to write something down.
Dipper!
(Throws clipboard and catches it) Uh what, yes?
Aren't ya gonna get in on this?
I don't really dance.
Yeah, you do! Mom used to dress him up in a lamb costume and make him do... (whispering to Wendy:)The Lamby Dance!
(Angrily to Mabel:) Now is not the time to talk about the Lamby Dance.
Lamb costume? Wow, is there like little ears and a tail or...?
Well uh, uh...
(Holds up picture) Dipper would prance around and sing a song about grazing.
(Cuckoo clock goes off) Hey, look at that! Quittin' time! The gang's waitin' for me.
Wait! Why don't I-or we come with you?
Ooh... I don't know. My friends are pretty intense. How old did you guys say you are?
We're thirteen! So, technically a teen.
All right. I like your moxie, kid! Let me get my stuff. (Leaves)
Since when are we thirteen? Is this a leap year?
Come on, Mabel. This is our chance to hang out with, you know, the cool kids. And Wendy and whatever.
I knew it! You love her! (Dances around Dipper, points at him and sings:) Love love love love love!
Oh hey, what's that? (Points)
Huh?
(Flips Mabel's hair over her face)
(Through hair) Bleh, bleh, bleh, bleh.
(Cuts to teens outside)
(A jelly bean hits Thompson in the face) Hurry up!
(Holding up Thompson)In the belly! In the belly! (Another jelly bean hits Thompson in the stomach) In the belly! In the belly!
(Gets ready to throw jelly bean)
(Bean hits Thompson in the belly button)
(Looks at his bean in confusion)
(Shows that Wendy was the one who threw the bean; Wendy straightens up from her throwing position, smiling)
Wendy!
Wendy! Wendy!
Hey guys! These are my pals from work, Mabel and Dipper.
I chewed my gum so it looks like a brain! BLAH! (Sticks out her tongue, which has a wad of gum on it)
She's not much for first impressions. (Points at himself) Unlike this guy! ...this guy...
So are you, like, babysitting, or-
Come on, Robbie! Guys, this is Lee and Nate.
(Nate punches Lee; He laughs)
Tambry.
(Texting) Heh...
Thompson, who once ate a runover waffle for 50 cents.
Don't tell them that.
And Robbie. You can probably figure him out.
Yeah, I'm the guy who spray-painted thewater tower.
Oh, you mean the bigmuffin!
Um, it's a giant explosion.
(Looks at water tower)
Hehe! Kinda does look like a muffin.
(Laugh)
(Glares at Dipper)
Let's hurry it up, guys. I got big plans for tonight, huh?
(Gets into the car)
(Goes over to the passenger seat and sees Robbie there)
Sorry kid, I'll ride shotgun alright?
(Gets into the back with Mabel)
Okay just, before we go, my mom said you guys aren't allowed to punch the roof anymore, so...
(Punches roof) Thompson! Thompson! Thompson!
(Reluctantly drives the car)
(Takes pen from Dipper, crosses out, "You stink!" on her door, writes "You look nice today!") (Speaking:)Ha! This is gonna blow someone's mind!
Mabel, please!
What, am I embarrassing you in front of your new GIRLFRI-
(Slaps hand over Mabel's mouth; pulls it away after Mabel licks it) Ugh! Did you just lick my hand?
(Cut to Stan sitting in front of TV)
You're watching the black and white period piece old lady boring movie channel!
Kids! I can't find the remote and I refuse to stand up!
Stay tuned for the Friday night movie,The Duchess Approves, starring Sturly Stembleburgiss as "The Duchess" and Grampton St. Rumpterfrabble as irascible coxswain "Saunterblugget Hampterfuppinshire!"
KIDS!
(The Duchess Approves begins)
NO!NOOOO!
(Cut to the teens and the twins standing in front of theDusk 2 Dawnfence)
There it is, fellas! The condemned Dusk 2 Dawn!
Whoa-ho-ho! Cool!
Neato!
W-why'd they shut it down? It's like a health code violation, or-
Try murder.
Some folks died in there. The place has been haunted ever since.
This town has such a colorful history!
What? Are you guys serious?
Yeah! We're all gonna die! Chill out man. (punches Dipper friendly) It's not as bad as it looks.
(Fast forward to everyone over the fence but Dipper. He is straddling the fence)
Come on, Dipper!
Okay! Okay! Just gotta get a foothold...
Dude, your sister did it!
(Running on the ground sideways in a circle) WOOP WOOP WOOP WOOP WOOP WOOP!
(Climbs up behind Dipper) Hey, you know what? Just, there you go. (Drops Dipper off the fence) Haha! S-sorry dude!
Good job throwing the kid off the fence, genius!
Your mom's a genius...
(Looks in the window of the store) Wow! This place is amazing!
(Tries to open door) I think it's, it's stuck!
Let me take a crack at it.
Oh yeah. I can't get in, but I'm sure Junior here is gonna break it down like Hercules.
Come on, leave him alone. He's just a little kid.
(Walks around to dumpster; jumps up on it)
Whoa, kid! What are you doing?
(Walks up the roof to the vents; punches it)
Go, Dipper! Punch that metal thing!
(Walks inside the vent)
Hey, Dipper! Take it easy!
Who wants to bet he doesn't make it?
(Walks out door; gestures for everyone to go inside)
Good call inviting this little maniac.
Your new name is Dr. Funtimes.
(High fives Dipper)
(Punches Dipper friendly) Nice work.
(Skips inside after everyone else)
Do you guys really think it's haunted?
Nah! Thompson, are you kidding me?
(The sign mysteriously turns from "Yes, we're open" to "Get lost! We're closed." Commercial break)
Whoa ho, man. it's even creepier than I imagined.
(Wipes dust off change slot. Licks the dust off her finger) Yep. It's dust.
(Wipes dust off newspaper)
Hey dude. Where do you think they keep the dead bodies?
(shoves Lee) Shut up, man!
Guys, check it out! You think these still work? (Turns on lights)
(Muttering positive things about the store)
Jackpot!
So, what are we going to do now?
Anything we want.

(Everyone throws food at each other, Lee and Nate hit each other with bags full of cat litter, then, everyone sits in a circle and pop three mints into a Pit Cola bottle; it explodes and everyone cheers)
(Runs around corner) Oh my gosh!Smile Dip! I thought this stuff was banned in America.
Maybe they had a good reason. (Gets hit by a balloon full of food. Runs off)
(Puts the stick into the the Smile Dip. Looks at the stick, then pours the entire package into her mouth)
(Wendy and Dipper are eating ice pops on a shelf)
(Offscreen:) Hey, come here, man, we got it ready!
Whatever it is, I'll do it!
(Laughs) Thompson! Dipper, this night is like, legendary.
Really?
Just look around. The guys are bonding.
(Stuff ice into Thompson's pants)
I've never even seen Tambry look up from her phone this long.
(Looks up from her phone for a second)
And your sister seems to be going nuts with that Smile Dip.
Ugh... Maybe I've had too much. What do you think?
Cut to Mabel's hallucination, she is in a valley that changes colors, and crazy pop music plays in the background
Elknurg...tsurtsid...tsum...
Would you like to eat my candy paws?
Of course you little angel. (Grabs the paw and chews it)
Cut to real life; Mabel is chewing on air.
You know Dipper, I wasn't sure if you could hang with our crew at first, but you're surprisingly mature for your age.
Yes, yes I am. (Smears ice cream on face)
Hey guys! We need more ice! (Shows Lee shaking a bag of ice over Thompson's pants)

I'm on it! (Jumps off the shelf and walks over to an ice freezer. He takes a bag of ice, but looks up to see some sort ofcooler monster) Aah! (Drops the ice and closes the door; he gasps and looks back at the door; he slowly opens the door again but the Cooler Monster is not there)
What was that? I thought I heard some lady screaming back here.
You freakin' out, kid?
Uh, no. I'm cool. Everything's cool.
Then what's all this about? (Points to the spilled ice)
That's uh, um uh...hey look!Dancy Pants Revolution! The game that tricks people into exercising!
(Mumble in agreement and walks over to play it)
Heh heh, yeah lets all- let's go play that. (Turns around and looks at the cooler's door. Then turns around again and walks to the video game)
Cuts to Thompson playing Dancy Pants Revolution, and everyone cheering him on.
Dance! Hurry up!
Go! Go! Go! Go! Go!
Wow. He's really terrible at this.

Heh heh, yeah. That's, that's great. (Looks into a glass door, and sees the reflections of Wendy, Robbie, Tambry, Thompson and himself. Their skin, however, is replaced by bones, Dipper rubs his eyes and everything is back to normal) I'll be right back. (Runs off to use a telephone) Come on, Grunkle Stan, pick up! Ugh, what is he doing!?
Cuts to Stan watching The Duchess Approves
I don't care about Dukes, or Commoners, or His Royal Highness Lionel of Cornwall! I'm not afraid anymore, Mother!
Duchess, I forbid you.
(Eats ice cream)
I may be a Duchess, but...I'm also a woman! (Takes her hat off to reveal her very long beautiful hair flying in the wind)
Yes! Yes! In your face Elizabeth! It's just like my life!...in a way.
Cuts to the phone hanging from the cord and Dipper walking over to Mabel.

Mabel, I need your advice. We're hanging out in a haunted convenience store, I can't get a hold of Grunkle Stan, and if I try to say anything about it to any of these guys they'll just think I'm a scared little kid or something!
(Makes a gurgling sound with Smile Dip all over her face, clothes, and her eyes small and green)
Mabel?
Zoom in on Mabel's face, fade to her hallucination: she's flying with the crazy pop music from before playing
The future! ...is in the past! OnwardsAoshima!
(Moves its fists in a circular motion. Its now two mouths open to reveal a fist coming out of each of them, and the fists open out & spit out rainbows)
Cut to real life.
(Shakes Mabel) Mabel! How many of these did you eat!?
Beleven.. teen...
Oh man. (Drops Mabel) Oh man, oh man, oh man.

(Uses a quarter to scratch lottery tickets) Ha! Ha ha ha! (Drops the coin and it rolls onto the floor and stops in front of a white line; goes to pick it up but stops) Whoa guys, you might wanna see this.
(Gather around the tape markings ofPaandMa's bodies, talking to each other)
Whoa. Then the rumors are true!
(Gulps)
(To Lee:) Dude, I dare you to lie down in it.
Good idea! (To Nate:) Go lie down in it!
I'm a dead body, look! (Walks over to the markings)
Wait! Maybe let's not do that.
This guy's scared!
All I'm saying is, why tempt the fates? I mean... What if this place really is... haunted?
Boo! Ah c'mon!
Yeah, just take it down a notch, Captain Buzzkill!
I thought I was Dr. Funtimes.
Well, you're acting like Captain Buzzkill! Right?
(Nod)
Yeah, little bit.
(Texting:) Status update: trapped in store with insane 9-year old.
I'm not a 9-year-old! (lies down in tape markings) I'm 13! Technically a teen!
The tape markings light up and the lights go out. Tambry looks up and dissolves.
(Picks up her phone, reading from it:) Status update: AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHH!!!!
(Appears on security camera screen) AAAAH!
AAAAAHHHH!
(Commercial break)
AAAAAAAAAAAAH!!
Tambry! Tambry!
Can you hear us!?
(Looks around in confusion)
What are we supposed to do!?
I don't know man! I don't know!
Let's just go already!
Thompson!
(Playing Dancy Pants Revolution)Wait! I've almost got the high score! (dissolves and reappears inside the game) Uh? What?
It's time to shake what your mama gave you!
No! So many arrows!
(Throws arrows down on Thompson) You're a dance machine!
No!You'rea dance machine! (Cries)
Oh no!
Thompson!
Forget him! Let's go!
The doors close
What the... (tries to open the door but can't) Guys, It's locked!
OUTTA MY WAY! (Throws the cash register at the doors, but it dissolves and green light flies at Robbie)
Everybody, wait! Whatever is doing this has to have some kind of reason! (opensJournal 3) Maybe if we could just figure out what it is, they'll let us out of here!
"Uh-uh, they'll let us out of here!" (Sarcastically:) Yeah, that makes a lot of sense!
I don't know guys, maybe he's got a point!
(Sarcastically:) Yeah right, I'm sure the ghost just wants to talk about his feelings. (Screams as he dissolves and reappears on a cereal box) W-what?
I'm bonkers for eating you alive! (Holds up a spoon)
No! (Screams as a stabbing sound is heard)
Lee! Okay, okay... I'm with you, kid! 100%, man!
(Possessing Mabel, flies up behind counter; through Mabel, deep voice:) Welcome.
(Scream)
They got Mabel!
Welcome to your graves, young trespassers. (Kicks legs and laughs)
W-we're super sorry for hanging out in your store!
Yeah! Can we just go now and leave forever?
Well, okay. You're free to go. (Opens doors) But before you leave, hot dogs are now half off. I know it might be crazy, but you gotta try these dogs!
(Scream and run for the door)
(Closes doors) Just kidding about the hot dog sale!
Just let us out of here already!
I don't like your tone! (Dissolves Nate)
(Reappears as a hot dog on the stove) No! I'M A HOT DOG!
It begins. (Makes everything float to the ceiling) Welcome to your home for all eternity!
Dipper, what do we do?!
DUCK!
(Duck to avoid a flying shelf)
(Points) Quick, in there!
(Run to a tipped over ice machine and hide inside and pant)
What do they want from us?!
Revenge, I guess?
What did we do wrong?
Okay, let's try to figure out the pattern here. Why was each person taken? Tambry was texting, Thompson was playing a video game, Lee was being sarcastic; it doesn't make any sense!
Yeah! I mean, those are all just normal teenage things.
... Wendy, say that last part again.
Normal teenage things?
Of course! Stay here until I get back! (crawls out of the freezer)
Dude, what are you doing?!
Hey ghost!
(twists Mabel's head around to face Dipper, then turns the rest of her body towards him)
I've got something to tell you! (makes Dipper float in the air) I'm not a teenager!
(drops everything that's floating and appears holding Mabel by her hair with Ma) Hohoho! Well, why didn't you say so? (drops Mabel into a pile of candy)
(Falling:) WAAH! (Lands in the candy and holds her head) Ohhh...
How old did you say you were?
I'm... (Reluctantly:) I'm twelve. Technically not a teen.
When we were alive, teenagers were a scourge on our store!

Always sassafrassin' costumers with their boomy boxes and disrespectful short pants! (Flashbacks to the 1990s when he and Ma died) So we decided to up and ban them. (Pa in the flashback places a sign labeled "NO TEENS" on the store window) But they retaliated with this new fangled rap music!
(In the flashback, hugs Pa) The lyrics, they were so, hateful!
(In the flashback, dancing to the rap:) Homework's whack, and so are rules! Tuckin' in your shirts for fools!
(In the flashback:)NO!
It was so shocking, we were stricken down with double heart attacks!
(In the flashback, clutch their chests and collapse, dead)
The flashback ends
(Brightly:) That's why we hate teenagers so much. Don't we, honey?
(Nose nuzzle)
But they're my friends, isn't there anything I can do to, help them?
There is one thing. Do you know any funny little dances?
Uh... is there anythingelseI can do?
(Lights himself on fire) NOOOO!
OKAY OKAY OKAY! Um... Well, I do know... (Reluctantly:) the Lamby Lamby Dance. But, uh, but I can't really do it without a lamb costume. (Folds his arms, happy to be out of it)
(Snaps his fingers and Dipper is in a lamb costume)

Oh, well... there it is. (Takes a deep breath, sings theLamby Lamby Dance) Wellll...Who wants a lamby lamby lamby? I do! I do! So go up and greet your mammy mammy mammy!
Hi there! Hi there!
So march march march around the daisies... (Wendy smiles; this is the cutest thing she had ever seen)
Yes, Yes! More! MORE!
(Marching and singing:) Don't don't don't you forget about the baby! (Sweats, winks)
That was so fine, girly dancin' boy! Your friends are free.
(In normal clothes) Well I don't think you have to worry about us coming back, so...
(Disappear and allow everything to fall back to the floor and freeing the teens)
Ugghhh... I'm never gonna eat or do anything ever again.
Hey. (Picks up a package of Smile Dip) There's still some left.
(Slaps it out of his hand) EVIL!
(To Wendy:) What-what happened after everything went crazy?

You are not going to believe it! The ghosts appeared, (laughing:) and Dipper had to... (sees Dipper looking at her, silently pleading with her not to tell anyone) Uh, and um, Dipper just grabbed a bat and just started beating ghosts down, left and right. (Nate and Lee high five) And then, the ghosts got all scared and ran away like a couple of little girls. It was insane!
No way!
(Laughs) Dr. Funtimes!
(Turns to Dipper and zips lips)
(Zips lips)
Cut to everyone except Dipper and Wendy sleeping in the van.
Well, I'm probably scarred for life.
Yeah, that was pretty crazy.
I think I'm gonna go stare at a wall for a while and rethink everything. Hey, next time we hang out, let's stay at the Mystery Shack. Okay?
Next time? Yeah! Let's, let's hang out at the Shack! Yeah... (gets in the car, to himself:) Next time... (closes the door and the car drives off)
OHHHHH... (sees the thing she wrote earlier) What kind of sick joke is this?
The car drives away from the store, and the lights go out in the store. Cut to credits.
(In front of the TV) Ah, the wedding. I've waited so long for this. Oh, look at her in that dress! (angrily as a door opens and people on the TV gasp:) Count Lionel? What'shedoin' here?!
(From TV:) I've come to reclaim my bride!
You had your chance at the cotillion, you!
(From TV:) You had your chance at the cotillion, you!
That's what I'm SAYING! UuuaaaAAAAGGGHHH!
Outside, Dipper and Mabel are walking to the door. The television flies out the window and falls down near them.
Uh... Couldn't find the remote.
(Episode ends)
Episode opens on the exterior of theMystery Shack; cuts to interior.
I like to get my Christmas shopping done early. Do you have anything that's in the spirit of the season?

(To Pacifica:)I'm Mabel.
That sounds like a fat old lady's name.

May the better partier win.(Menacingly walks away with her friends)
(To Pacifica:)Nice meeting you!(To Grenda and Candy:)She's going down.
(Looks at party through window)Whoa! Sounds like the party's getting nuts.
Let the battle for the party crown begin! Mabel comes out strong! Watch out, Pacifica!
I've gotta get in there!(To Dipper:)Cover for me?
Umm... well I, um–
Thanks, man!(Goes inside and dances)
(To the crowd of people waiting to get tickets:)I'll be back shortly! (To himself:)Sure Stan won't mind if I'm gone for a few minutes.(Turns to run inside)
(Grabs Dipper by the back of his shirt)Hey! What are you doing, kid? These suckers aren't gonna rip themselves off!
Yeah!
You promised, remember?
I did?
(Plays a tape recording of Dipper's promise)
I promise.
(Walks off step by step and suddenly goes back for checking)
Woo-hoo-hoo!
If only I could be two places at once.(Goes into Stan's office, lies down on the copy machine and presses the copy button)I wonder if this is a good idea.
Dipper is copied. The paper with the copy of him falls to the ground. It ripples, and the Dipper clone comes to life.
Whoa! ...I have a really big head.
So, uh...(Chuckles)sorry, you first. Stop copying me!(Laugh)
(Tries to slap his leg but hits his elbow on the copy machine)Ow, ow! Funny bone!
(Writes the number 2 on the clone's head)I will call you: Number 2.
Definitely not. You know a name I've always wanted?
Tyrone?
Okay, Tyrone. Let's get down to business. I'm thinking you cover me at the ticket stand, while I ask Wendy to dance.
I know the plan, buddy.
(Pull out Dipper's plan)
(Backs away from Tyrone)Hey, we're not gonna get jealous and turn on each other like the clones in the movies, are we?
Dipper, please. This is you you're talking about. Plus, hey!(Snaps his fingers)You can always just disintegrate with me with water.
(Tap their heads)Yeeah...(Tap each other's heads)Yeeeeah!
Tyrone mans the ticket station while Dipper is inside. They give each other the thumbs up. Dipper then walks over to Wendy.
Great news, Wendy! I got somebody to cover the concessions for me!
That's awesome. You can hang out with me andRobbie. Robbie you remember Dipper from the convenience store?
Uh, no. Yo, Wendy, check out my new guitar.(Plays guitar)
Whoa, cool!
(Gasps and then imagines Robbie and Wendy dancing)
Robbie, you're a stupid, arrogant fraud; but kiss me anyway because you can play guitar. Oh wait, I forgot something.(Walks over and punches Dipper; to Robbie:) LET'S GET MARRIED TONIGHT!
(Calls Dipper)Hey buddy it's me, you. I just had the same jealousy fantasy.
We got to get rid of Robbie if I ever want to dance with Wendy!
Hey, Dipper! We're gonna go sit on the couch! Meet us when you're done.
Oh no! They're sitting on the couch! We gotta think of something quick!(sees Robbie's bike)I got an idea!
I got the same one. But we're gonna need some help.
(Cut to Stan's office, where he is writing the number 3 on a third clone's hat)And that's where you come in number three!
But what if Robbie catches me? I'll be all alone!
Yeah, makes a good point.
Okay, one more. Good point. Four Dippers. This is a four Dipper plan.(Makes another copy of himself)
The machine jams.
Uh-oh, paper jam. (Pulls the paper out of the machine and screams as it comes to life)
(Rising out of the paper and attacking Tyrone)NYANYANYANYANYA-NAAAAA-NAAAAA. AAXUXAASSUAA-AAAA.
C'mon, you're not gonna make me partner up withhim, are you?
(To Number 3:)SSSHH! Don't be rude.(To Paper Jam Dipper:)Hey, buddy hey. It's okay.
AAAA-KKKKKKKXXX-KKKKXXX-A.
Okay. Just one more clone.
Cut to Pacifica on a stage.
(Singing:)Always means forever(closes eyes), ALWAAAAAYYYSS!(her high voice breaks a plastic cup; whispering and points)Forever.
I used to sing like that, before my voice changed.
Pacifica pulls ahead!
Try and top that!(Hands Mabel the microphone)Oh, Grenda, by the way, you sound like a professional wrestler.
I WANNA PUT HER IN A HEADLOCK AND MAKE HER FEEL PAIN!

(Puts on Don't Start Un-Believing)
Excellent.(Singing:)Don't start UN-BELIEVING!Never don't not feel your feelings!(Everyone cheers)(Twirls her mic around)NOW I'M GONNA DO A FLIP!(lands on her face)THAT WAS FOR YOU GUYS!
Everyone cheers except Pacifica, who looks at the crowd, and Dipper whispers something in Soos' ear.
Dudes, would the owner of a silver and red dirt bike please report outside. It is being stolen right now.

Clones 3 and 4 ride Robbie's bike away from the shack and laugh.
(Chasing them)Hey, come back here!
(To Wendy:)Oh, tough break. I wonder who those guys are who aren't me because I'm right here.

Oh snap, I love this song.(Sways her head in time to the music)
(Runs over to Dipper)Hey goofus, now's your chance to ask Wen–(Dipper covers Mabel's mouth. They move away from Wendy)Now's your chance to ask Wendy to dance! C'mon! Go!
Ok, ok.(Struggles to go over)I-uh,(Runs away the opposite direction)Uh, I'll be right back!
Cut to Tyrone and Dipper pacing around each other in the attic
Oh, I agree. You can't just go and DANCE with her.

Stan might get in the way.
Robbie might come back.
There's too many variables. We need help.
Dipper makes 6 more clones of himself.
Alright, Dippers! Gather round! Now's the time! You all clear on want to do?
The clones nod monotonously and leave the attic. Number 10 walks up the Soos.
Hey, Soos, look! A glowing dot!
Oh man, I'm so glad I turned my head. That dot does not disappoint.

While Soos is distracted, number 10 puts in a disc labeled "Wendy Mix." The rest of the clones do their jobs as well. Number 8, who is sitting above the party, puts a dollar on a fishing rod and dangles it in front of Stan.
Right, like I'm gonna fall for that.(pretends not to notice, then tries to grab the money)GIVE ME THAT...(Chases it away)MONEY, MONEY!
While Stan is distracted, Number 6 rings a bell.
There's your cue. It's the perfect moment to ask Wendy to dance. Good luck, me!
I don't need luck. I have a plan.(Leaves attic and sees Wendy in the hallway)AH!
Oh hey, man. What's up?
W-What are you doing here? I mean, wouldn't you rather be out on the dance floor,(looks at watch)uh, in like exactly 42 seconds?
I'm just waiting for the bathroom.
Um, uh, okay.(Pulls out his list, to himself:)Small talk, small talk, small talk!
So hey, let's say everyone at this party gets stuck on a desert island. Who do you think the leader would be?
I, uh...
I think I'd go with this lunatic. (Points at a short, sweaty man dancing)
Ha, ha, ha.(Puts list away)I'd probably go for Stretch over there, uh, because tall people can reach coconuts?(points at a tall man doing the moonwalk)
Speaking of tall, wanna see something?(Pulls out a picture with her thumb over one of herbrothers)Those are my brothers, and I'm,(Lifting her thumb)boooop.
Ha, you were a freak!(Covers mouth)
Yep.
You know, kids used to make fun of my birthmark before I started hiding it all the time.
Birthmark?
Uh, no! It's nothing! I-I was-I wa–why did I say that?
No way, dude! Now you have to show me! Show me, show me!
(Lifts his bangs up to show his forehead, revealing a Big Dipper-like birthmark)

The Big Dipper! That's how you got your nickname! I thought your parents just hated you or something. Hey, I guess we're both freaks.(They clink cups and laugh as Pacifica exits the bathroom)Wait here?(Goes into the bathroom)
Of course.
(Coming in with the rest of the clones behind him)Hey! What are you doing up here? Number 10 has been distracting Soos for 15 minutes; he's gonna get tired of that dot eventually!
(Off-screen:)Never!
You won't believe it guys! I bumped into Wendy accidentally and things are actually going great!
That's nice, but not the plan. Do we have to remind you?
(Read some steps from the list asynchronously)
Oh man, you guys sound crazy. Look, maybe we don't need the plan anymore, you know? Maybe I could just go talk to her like a normal person.
(Gasp)
What?!
You bite your tongue!
If you're not gonna stick to the plan, maybe you shouldn't be the Dipper to dance with Wendy.
Yes/If you think about it... Five/Number Five's got a point.
Guys, c'mon. We said we weren't gonna turn on each other.
I think we all knew we were lying.
(Grab Dipper and pull him away)
No, no, hey, hey! AAAAAH!
(Throw Dipper in a closet)
No, wait!
(Close the door)
(Trying to trick Tyrone)Ahh, I can't breath in here!
Yes you can! Plus there's snacks and a coloring book in there for you!
(Sigh, eats a cracker angrily)Omnomnom...

Okay, now that Original Dipper or "Dipper Classic" is no longer fit for it, I nominate myself to dance with Wendy instead. I've been around the longest, so it should be me. Right? I mean logically. Logically, guys.
Fair point, fair point. Counterpoint, maybe I should get to dance with Wendy because I've been around her the least.
That makes, like, zero sense.
(Pushes number 5)YOUMAKE ZERO SENSE!
(Shoves number 10)Watch it!
(Shoves number 5)Don't shove people!
NANANANANA-AAAAAAA!
Hey, you want some cheese and crackers, buddy?
KKSSKSKSS.
(Tries to give Paper Jam Dipper a cracker but realizes he has no mouth)Yikes.(To the rest of the clones:)Hey, guys, what would you do if you were trapped in a closet?
Break out.(Looks at closet to see that it's open)
(Facepalm)
(Runs down stairs and to balcony)WEND-!
(Covers his mouth and drags him back to the other clones)
C'mon, man. Give it up. You're overpowered.
Hold on guys, think about it. We're exact equals mentally and physically. If we start fighting, it'll just go on for infinity.
As the clones agree, Dipper punches Tyrone. The clones stare at them and there is an awkward pause.
CLONE FIGHT!
The clones start fighting each other.
(Slapping Dipper)Quit hitting myself, quit hitting myself! (Is tackled by Number 8)
Numbers 5 and 8 hold Tyrone back as 10 slaps him in the stomach
Guys guys, c'mon it's me!
As the clones fight, Dipper crawls through the crowd and nearly gets away. They notice Dipper and the fight stops.

The clones stare at the real Number 7.
(Shaking his head and panicking)That's not me guys, that's not me!

Get him!
The clones march toward Dipper cornering him & Dipper backs away from them.
Stay back, stay back!
(Fires a party popper, which turns on the sprinkler, causing the clones to melt)
Boo! C'mon! Lame! This stinks! Boo!
NANANANANANA-KSCKSKSSOSKS(Subtitled:)It's better this way for Paper Jam Dipper
Huh, how 'bout that. (Notices Tyrone standing behind him)
You!

Cut to the party room. Mabel is doing the worm.
One more song, dudes, and then it's time for the bestowing of the party crown. It's gonna be the–(plays an explosion sound with the keyboard)Nailed it.
Pacifica, I just wanna say that whoever wins, it's been a super fun party.
Tsk. Awwww, it thinks it's gonna win. Hey, did you hear that?(Mabel cups her hand next to her ear)People clapping for the weird girls? Yeah, me neither.
Cut back to Dipper and Tyrone fighting.
Say it! Say I can dance with Wendy!
Never!
(Hear Wendy laughing and stop fighting)Wendy?
(Listening to something Robbie is saying and laughing.)Robbie!(Hits him)Shut up!(Laughs)
(Sigh)We blew it man.(Sit down)
I don't know, you wanna go grab a couple sodas or something?
Cut to the party room.
Let the party crown voting commence!(plays bell sound)
(Sarcastically)Good luck,Mabel.
Applaud to vote for Mabel.
The crowd applauds loudly.
Let's check the applause meter.(Raises hand)Oh, oh, very good.
(Smiles)
And the next contestant: Pacifica.
The crowd applauds quietly, but Pacifica glares at them angrily. More people reluctantly start to clap for her.

(Looks around and sees Old Man McGucket sleeping on a bench. She runs to him and gives him a dollar)
(Clapping)Ha! Haha! Hahahahaha!
Ladies and gentlemen, we-we have a winner.(Disappointed)The winner of the contest, is Pacifica Northwest.(Gives Pacifica the crown)
Thank you, Jorge. Thank you everyone! Everyone comes to the after-party at my parents' boat! Woo-hoo!

(To Grenda and Candy:)Sorry I let you guys down. I understand if you wanna leave.

Literally!
Wow!(makes an explosion sound).
(Touch cans and drink the soda)
(Stomach melts)Oh boy, don't look now.
Tyrone!

Uh-uh, of course.
Hey, and quit being such a wimp around Wendy okay? For my sake...(Melts completely)BLBLBLBLBLBL!

(Counting money)Hahaha!
Soos is playing music and the girls are dancing. Wendy is by the side nodding her head to the beat. Dipper prepares to go in, then stops and rips up the list and goes inside the shack.

End credits.

(Presses the keyboard buttons one by one. From left-to-right, it plays the sound effects of a doorbell, a small explosion, a clown horn, a man saying "Yeah!", a gong, a cat, a tube getting plugged, a monkey, a man saying "Agh!", a gulp, a baby cry, a hammer banging an anvil, a cuckoo clock, a dog, crickets, and a toilet. The episode begins with the twins eatingCorncornosinsideStan's car.Stanis honking whileMabelattaches nachos from her chip bag to her ears.

A few women gasp in the presence of him nearly running them over. He backs up, and begins to drive the car backwards.
Grunkle Stan, what's going on?
We gotta get outta here... Before it's too late!(Sees that his car his trapped between a group of covered wagons)They've circled the wagons! We're trapped!NOOOOOOOOO!!
(Looks outside her window and sees a cow)I've got a good feeling about today.

The twins and Stan get out of the car and walk around an old fashioned-lookingMain Street.
Man, look at the town.(Holds a postcard up for a second. When he lowers it, the town is a sepia shade, but it is just due to a pane of dirty glass)
(Walking by, holding one end of the pane of dirty glass)Dirty glass. We got dirty glass! Dirty glass.
Ah, boy. It'sPioneer Day. Every year these yahoos dress up like idiots to celebrate the dayGravity Fallswas founded.
(Approaches Stan as a paperboy)Welcome to 1863!
(Pulls up his left sleeve to threaten Toby)I willbreakyou, little man!
Ahh!(Runs away and crashes into a barrel)
Cuts to a view of people doing various activities, panning right. People doing candle dipping.
Wow! Look! Candle dipping!
People doing gold panning.Old Man McGucket, who is also gold panning, can be heard in the background, saying "Gold!"
Whoa, gold panning!
(To amanandwoodpecker:)I now pronounce you man and wife.
(Pecks her husband's hand)
I do!
(Confused)What chu talking 'bout?
Oh yeah. I remember this.(Takes outJournal 3)In Gravity Falls it used to belegal to marry woodpeckers.
Oh, it's still legal.(Puts a hand on his shoulder, where the woodpecker is perched)Verylegal.(Walks away as the announcer speaks up)
Come one and all for the opening ceremonies!
Grunkle Stan, you coming?
No, thank you! Just remember if you come back to theShacktalking like these people, you're dead to me!
(Starts acting with a Southern twang in his voice)Thar's a carpetbagger in the turnip cellar!
Well, hornswabber my haversack!
(Spit on ground and run off, laughing)
(Raises his fist, angrily)DEAD TO ME!!!
A crowd assembles around a large stage.
Here-ye, here-ye! Ye olde commencement ceremony is about to commence.
(Ringing bell)Woo! I got a bell!
Cut to the audience, where a robber steals anold woman'spurse.
Oh, no! Police, my purse!
(Rings bell)Ring ring! Ring ring! Woo!
(Chuckles)He sure loves his bell.
(Comes on stage and taps a microphone)Howdy, everyone! You all know me, Pacifica Northwest, great-great granddaughter of town-founder,Nathaniel Northwest. I'm also very rich.
The crowd applauds.
Now if you've got the pioneer spirit, we ask you to come on up and introduce yourself.
(Gasps)Audience participation!
I don't know, Mabel. Isn't that girl kinda like your arch-enemy?
That's water under the bridge.(Laughs and runs onstage)
Our first newcomer is...(Sees Mabel; angrily:)Mabel...
Yeah! Let's get this Pioneer Day started! Right guys? USA! USA!
USA! USA!
(While crying tears of joy:)USA, USA!
I'm sorry to break it to you, but Pioneer Day is for serious people, and you look and act ridiculous.(Looking at Mabel's sweater)I mean, a puppy playing basketball? Are you always this silly?
(Grabs onto her sweater, looking embarrassed)Hey, I can be serious!(Glares)
You do have nachos hanging from your ears, hon.
(Touches her nacho earrings and blushes in embarrassment)
Haha, wow, I'm embarrassed for you.(To the audience:)Give her a hand everybody!
Crowd applauds and Dipper looks worried.
(Sadly walks off of the stage)
Now who wants to hear more aboutme?
(To the people standing near him as he makes his way toward Mabel)Excuse me.
(As the Northwest Family lines up for a photo)Everyone say Northwest!
Northwest!
Camera clicks, taking picture.
(Laughs and tilts head)We're perfect.
Cut to Mabel and Dipper.
(To Mabel:)Hey, you okay?
I need some old-timey butterscotch.
Cut to Stan in his car, which is stuck in the mud.Stevewalks up to him.
Hey there, uh, donkey boy! Give me a hand with my car, huh?
Here in 1863, I have never heard-tell of a "car." Pray-tell,(Uses his crowbar to poke Stan's car)what is this magic wheel box?
Ah, c'mon, Steve, you're a mechanic for Pete's sake! Cut me some slack.
"Slack"... I am unfamiliar with thisbold, new expression.
I can't take this anymore!(Grabs Steve by the collar)I'm getting dumber every second I'm here!
(Running up alongside Durland)Are we gonna have to intervene here?
Oh, look. The "Constable." What are you gonna do? Throw me in "ye stocks?"(Laughs.)
Cut to Stan in stocks.
Aw, c'mon!(Gideon, wearing old fashioned, nobleman attire, walks by, humming)Hey, nice outfit, Gideon. You actually looklessgirly than usual.
Why, Stanford. I'm just a humble tomato farmer, selling his wares. Whoops, I dropped one.(Throws a tomato at Stan's left eye)Whoops, I dropped another one.(Throws a tomato at Stan's right eye)
Ugh!(Tomatoes still covering his eyes, looks up at sky and screams angrily:)PIONEER DAY!!!
Scene transitions to the twins sitting near a large statue of Nathaniel Northwest. Mabel eats a candy piece, mildly depressed.
Dipper, can I ask you something? Do you think I'm silly?
Uh, nnnoooo?

I knew it! The nacho earrings, the sweater. I thought I was being charming, but I guess people see me as a big joke.(Throws off her nacho earrings, takes off her sweater, and ties her sweater around her waist)
C'mon, Mabel, you love that sweater!
I did before Pacifica ruined it for me. She ruins everything!

(Stands up, turns around, and glares at the statue)Pacifica! Why does she think that being related to the town founder means she gets to treat everyone like garbage? Someone needs to take her down a peg.(Gasps)Wait a minute! I feel like I read something about Pacifica's great-great grandfather before.(OpensJournal 3)Of course! Oh, this is perfect.(In a deep voice:)"In my investigations..."(Normal voice:)Should- should I do the voice?
(Cringes)Nuh-uh.

I'll just read... normal.(Reading from journal:)"In my investigations I recently made a discovery. Nathaniel Northwest may not be the founder of Gravity Falls! I believe this secret is emburied somewhere on the enclosed document. If only I could crack the code."(Opens the document, revealing a complex series of letters, symbols and words)Oh, man! If this cover-up is true, it means Pacifica's whole family is a fraud. This could be a major conspiracy!
Really?
I got to investigate this!
Wait! I'm coming with you. Conspiracies are serious, right?
Oh yeah, definitely.
Well, if I help you crack this code, then nobody could ever call me silly again!
Yeah! Mystery twins?
I thought you hated that.
I'm starting to accept it.
(Fist bump and run off)
As Mabel takes her bag of candies to catch up with Dipper, Sheriff Blubs is seen eavesdropping behind the statue. He immediately speaks to adispatchervia walkie-talkie.
This is Sheriff Blubs. We've got a code sepia!
(Spits out coffee)What?! And what are you doing about it?
I'm following them right now.
Find them and stop them. There's no room for error.
I understand. Blubs out.(To Durland:)Deputy Durland, maintaining this cover-up is the mission we've been training for our entire careers. Are you ready?
(Ringing bell)Whoo!
Hehe, if being delightful was a crime, you'd be breaking the law.
Let's go get 'em!(Both start chasing after the twins, whooping)
Cuts to inside theGravity Falls Library.
Back in the olden days, pioneers drew subsistence from telling stories 'round the fire. So let's eat some books, children! Go ahead, eat the books!(Chews a book like a dog)
Alright, Mabel, if we can prove that Nathaniel Northwest wasn't the real founder of Gravity Falls, it'll finally put Pacifica in her place.
And solving a mystery will prove that I'm not silly. I'm serious.(Laps up candy from the table into her mouth with her tongue)Seeeeriousss...

(Places some slides into a projector)We just need to crack this code. Let me see... it's not Egyptian, it's not numerology, it's not, wait-of course! The triangle is the alchemist symbol for flame. Lighting the parchment on fire will reveal the secret message!
It's so obvious!(Dipper picks up a lit candlestick)
Alright, let's just light this sucker up and--- Mabel!
(Now wearing a hat she made out of the document)Mwop! I just made a hat. Ugh, I just did something silly again.(Blows a raspberry)
Wait, Mabel. You folded it into a map! And I was gonnaburnit...
(To alibrarian:)We're on the lookout for two kids who might be reading.
We're hunting 'em down for secret reasons!(Rings bell)WHOO!
(Hide under the table.)
(Knocks row of books off a shelf)DERP!
(To Mabel:)Maybe we should take this elsewhere...
This map should lead us to...(Cut to the twins standing in front of amuseum.)...The Gravity Falls Museum of History.
You realize what this means, Mabel.(Looks up and squints.)We're gonna have to break in.
Dramatic music plays. Cut to Dipper and Mabel inside the museum at the entrance.
...And those are your free Pioneer Day passes, and your balloons, blue and pink.(Hands them balloons)
Dramatic music plays.
(Still looking up and squinting)We're in.
(Walking through museum)What are we gonna do next, steal Thomas Jefferson's rib cage?
Ewww, no. According to the map, the next clue about the real town founder should be right... here!
A triangular exhibition piece is mounted on the wall.
We've gotta figure this one out quick, I have a feeling those cops weren't at the library to check out books...
I don't think the one with the bell can read...
So what is it anyway?
The twins analyze the exhibit.
Hmmmm...
Mabel gets bored and walks over to a bench to sit down.
(Walks over to a bench and sits down; turning upside-down on the bench)Hey painting, be less stupid!(Gasps)It worked!
Huh?(Runs over and lays upside-down on the bench. He sees an angel statue pointing left)Wait! It's not abstract, it's upside-down!
I think I've seen that statue in thecemetery.
Let's go! Quick!
(Stand up and get dizzy, holding their heads)Ow.
Head rush.
(To Deputy Durland:)I'm sorry, but we're all out of pink balloons.
(Disappointed:)Why did we even come?
(Over walkie-talkie:)Officer Blubs.
(Runs into the museum so that they're out of earshot; using walkie-talkie:)Blubs here.
Have the targets been apprehended?
Negative, but we're close. I promise, those kids'll never get past us.
(Run past them)
Hey! Wait!
Blubs and Durland chase the kids out of the museum, but get stuck in the door.
Dang it!
Cut to the Woodpecker and husband's house.
For the last time, we arenotgoing south for the winter! Our home is here!
(Pecks the table)
Youalwayssay that!(Storms out of the house)
(Struggling to get out of the stocks, trying to unlock the lock with a hairpin in his mouth)C'mon! C'mon, ugh!(Drops pin)
(Picks up the pin)Well, if it isn't Mabel's uncle, Mr. Pines. Looking for this?(Holds up the pin)
Yeah, yeah. What d' ya want, money?
I want you to say that the Northwest family is the best family in Gravity Falls.
Oh sure, you want that in writing?
(Gives Stan a pen and let him writes something on a note with his mouth)
There you go.(The note says "YOU STINK!")Ha! I did that with my mouth!
(Whistles, catching the attention of people with tomatoes, and points to Stan)
Aw, come on!
Cuts to Dipper and Mabel in the cemetery. Dipper is looking at the angel statue that is pointing off in the distance.
Ah... The statue must be pointing to the next clue.(Looks in direction statue is pointing but then turns back when Mabel speaks up)
(The finger of the statue sticking in her nose)Oh, gross! She's picking my nose! Ha ha!(The tip of the statue's finger bends upward, opening a secret door in the grave)Ach.
Mabel, look!
Ha! Who's silly now, Pacifica? Bam!(Tries to jump down from statue but her nose is still there so the finger tugs on her nose)Ahh! Ow. Ow. Ow.(Getting down from the statue)Okay.
Dipper and Mabel walk down the secret steps leading to a dark underground tunnel.
