line: Ugh, high school registration.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Ooh! You know I'm only a year away from high school myself. Would you say your experience is more rom-com, or wacky romp?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: More like teen horror movie. High school is the worst. Classes get super hard, your body just flat out turns against you, and worst of all, everybody hates you.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Cut to two girls growling at each other, then pan to Thompson and Robbie.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Can't do it! Can't do another year!

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: My hormones are like a sweaty cage!(Punches bulletin board)

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Why aren't they singing about following their dreams? TV taught me that high school was like some sort of musical.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: TV lied, man! If you could avoid growing up, do it. I'd give anything to be 12 again. Anyway, what are you guys doing here?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Chuckles, sadly:)Oh, just looking for a place to have my 13th birthday party.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Wendy...Borduroy? I-I mean Corduroy?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: All the students laugh at Wendy.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Blushes red)See what I mean?(walks to teacher)

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Exits the gym; on the walkie talkie:)Master Mabel to Dippidy Dog. We can have our party at the gym, but we gotta talk about high school. I'm starting to think it might not be the awesome future we were expecting. Over.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (On the walkie talkie:)I'm going through a bad patch, Mabel. We'll talk when I get back.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Dipper? Come in, come in?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Hey, I know what'll make you feel better. Let's deliver some invites to your friends, huh?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Yeah!

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Mabel and Soos drive away. Mabel finds that the sign now reads "NO ESCAPE." Cut to Dipper and Ford walking to the Floating Cliffs.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (To the walkie talkie:)Mabel? Mabel, you there? Ugh.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Listen, Dipper. In order to seal the rift for good, it's going to take anadhesivestronger than anything on earth. Something...extraterrestrial in origin.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: W-What do you mean?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Dipper, look at the peculiar shape made by those cliffs. Does it remind you of anything?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Hmm...

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Jingles his UFO key chain and holds it up over the cliffs)

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Gasps quietly)Shut. Up.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: According to my research, the entire valley ofGravity Fallswas formed when anextraterrestrial objectcrash-landed here millions of years ago. Did this craft cause the town's strange properties? Or, did the town's strange properties attract the craft? The answer is still unknown.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: But, that's crazy! Where did the saucer go?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Sometimes the strangest things in the world are right under our noses.(pushes rock away, revealing underground entrance)And our feet, in this particular instance. Now you might wanna stand back. Thismagnet guncan rip the fillings out of a man's mouth from 100 feet.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (backs away a few steps as Ford detaches the opening)Whoa!

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: I used to raid this thing for parts for years. Where do you think I got the materials to build myportal?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: You...I...words... not working for mouth.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Now come. Take this.(throws Dipper a magnet gun)

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Scrambling to catch the magnet gun)Whoa, whoa!

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Don't worry, I've been down here countless times; all the aliens have been dead for millions of years.(Starts climbing down but then pops up)Probably.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Dipper takes a deep breath and heads down the entrance. Cut to commercial.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: I can't believe there's been a giantUFOunder the town this whole time.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: I wish my mind could be where yours is right now, Dipper. When confirmation of extraterrestrials still had that punch. Now it's just sort of "eh."McGucketand I used to come down here all the time to raid their tech and study their language.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: This is so cool!(Takes a selfie with some of the alien symbols and laughs)

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: The substance we need to seal the rift is analien adhesive. Strong enough to keep the hull of a spacecraft together. Just one dollop of this adhesive should be enough to seal a crack in space-time. Also, if it touches you it will seal up all the orifices in your face,(cocks gun)so try to avoid that. Now, use your magnet gun and follow me. Hup!(Uses magnet gun to climb down a pillar)

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Great-uncle Ford!

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Your turn! Say "hup"! It helps!

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Releases a deep breath)Okay. Just turn on magnet, leap down hole. Turn on...(fiddles with gun)C'mon already.(gun whirs to life)Magnet.(grunts as he jumps)Ah!(crashes onto the ceiling)A little help?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Cut to Grenda's house. Mabel knocks on her front door.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Oh hi, Mabel! You're just in time for our 1 o'clock boy talk.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: If you think that's good...Boom! Me and Dipper's 13th birthday jam!

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Aw, man. Your birthday's on the last day of summer? I'm not gonna be here.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: What?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Mariusis flying me out to Austria to hang out in his castle or whatever that week. He's so clingy!

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: You're gonna be out of town for my birthday? But at least you can come, right, Candy?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Sorry, Mabel. My parents send me to music camp this time of year. There is no escape from music camp.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: So neither of you are gonna be at my birthday party? And you won't be able to wish me goodbye at the end of the summer?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: I'm sorry, Mabel.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Summer happened so fast.(Answers phone:)Ugh, Marius! Now's not the time!

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: I think I need to radio for emotional back-up.(To walkie-talkie:)Dipper, please come in. Our party mission is going down in flames. Over.(Static on the walkie talkie; sighs)

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Cut to Dipper and Ford underground.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: This is their storage facility. This place would've been heavily guarded, but now everything's defunct. Go ahead, flip any switch. They've all been busted for millions of years.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Dipper pushes a button and it causes apetting zooto fall down a hole.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (To a cow behind him:)Clara, did you eat my farm?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Moos)

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Cut back to Dipper and Ford.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: The glue should be around here somewhere, so keep your eyes peeled. Dipper, let me ask you something. Have you thought much about your future?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: No, not really. I mean, beyond graduating high school with a high GPA so I can get accepted to a good technical college with a photography and media production minor to start my own ghost hunting show.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Ha, heh heh! It's like talking to a younger version of myself. If you're so sure of what you want out of life, why wait? Why put up with the drudgery of school?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Heh. Trust me, I'd love to fast-forward the whole thing, but it's not like I have a choice.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Dipper, I've been thinking. I'm getting too old to investigate Gravity Falls on my own. I need to train an apprentice to help me fight monsters, solve mysteries, and protect this town. And I think I'd--I'd like to keep it in the family.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: What are you saying?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: I've read your additions to myjournaland I'm impressed with your potential. What would you say to staying in Gravity Falls after the summer ends and becoming my apprentice?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: W-what about school?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Dipper, I have 12 PhDs. Your parents would be thrilled I could give you such an advanced education.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Sighs)There's also Mabel. She'd be all alone in California.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Mabel will be fine on her own. She has a magnetic personality. I watched her become pen pals with the pizza delivery man in the 60 seconds he was at the door.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Gosh, we've never really been apart before.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: And isn't it suffocating? Dipper, can you honestly tell me you never felt like you were meant for something more?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: I-I dunno. Sounds like a dream come true, but I'm not sure I have what it takes. I was tricked by Bill, I was wrong about Stan's portal. Heck, I can't even operate this magnet gun right.(Turns on the magnet gun and it sucks up a piece of metal. As Dipper tries to get it free, something pink seeps out of it)

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Ha! Yes! Dipper, you've found the adhesive!

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: I did?!

line: Hoho, you really did it, kid. Huddle in, let's get a picture of this.(Hears something and holds up gun)

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Whispering:)Uh, Grunkle Ford, you said everything in here is dead, right?

line: Thesecurity droidsemerge.

line: What do we do?!

line: Listen to me very carefully: I've studied these; they're security droids and they detect adrenaline. You simply have to not feel any fear and they won't see you.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: What?!

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: It's okay. I've done it before. Just take a deep breath, focus on your intellect, and control your fear.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Huh-wha-wha-wha- that's crazy! I-

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Follow my lead!

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Great-uncle Ford!

line: Focus, Dipper!

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Wha- I-uh. I-I-uh...

line: The droid produces a gun.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: I can't!

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Get down!(Tackles Dipper, dodging the flash from the gun; stands up and shoots the droid, destroying it, but Ford gets hit with a flash)

line: The other droid produces arms and drags Ford toward it.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Uh! No! Noooooo!

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: The droid traps Ford in itself.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: You're gonna have to do it without me! Use the adhesive! Fix the rift! Save the universe, Dipper!

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: The droid flies away into the tunnels.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Great-uncle Ford!(Chases the droid through the tunnels)Hang on, I'm coming for you!(Puts the rift in his backpack)Don't worry! I'll get you out of there!

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: The droid disappears behind a saucer-shaped door.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Where is that thing taking you?!

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: The room glows purple and some kind of map appears.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Offscreen)It's an automated prison droid! And wherever it's going, I'm not coming back!

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: What?!(Gasps as the ceiling opens to outside)

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Arm carries Ford toward the opening.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: No, no, no... don't worry, I'll think of something!(Runs after Ford)

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Dipper! What on Earth are you doing?!

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Puts duct tape around the magnet gun)Hold on, Great-uncle Ford.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: The droid Ford is in hovers below the exit.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: I'm getting you out of this, one way or another!(Tries to fire the gun but it doesn't work)Oh no!(Punches the gun, which has sparks flickering around it)

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: The alien countdown appears to be at zero.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Come on, come on!(The gun turns on and magnets Dipper to Ford's droid)

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: The droid blasts away.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: AAAAAAAAAHHHHH!!

line: The droid breaks through a grate and is outside, flying high into the air.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Hat falls off, grunting, pounds the droid)Let go of my uncle!(Screams as the droid shakes and beeps)

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: The droid, as Dipper screams, swerves around, flies through the crack in the cliff, through the waterfall and through thewater tower. The droid bumps, knocking Ford unconscious.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Ah! Great-uncle Ford! Okay, let's try: magnet pulse!(Turns a knob on the gun) Waaaaaaahhhh!

line: The droid crashes into the woods. Dipper is lying behind it, bruised and moaning.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Gasps and runs to the droid)Oh no!(Pounding on the glass)Oh no no no no!(Opens the window and runs in to Ford, who is still unconscious)Come on, wake up, man!(Drags him out)We gotta get out of here before-

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Another droid is behind them. It begins to scan Dipper.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Hey, uh, I'm warning you! I have a magnet gun!

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: The droid produces a large gun.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Oh yeah!? You think you can scare me!? Do your worst! Nothing in this universe is gonna take away my uncle! So go ahead! Give me what you've got!

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: The machine measures Dipper's heartbeat, finds it normal, retracts its gun, and turns off.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Pants)

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Ahahaha! Oh-(coughs)Oh, I thought I was a goner, kid.(coughs)

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Runs to him)Oh, are you alright? What happened?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Leaning on Dipper)The- the orb didn't detect any chemical signs of fear. It- it assumed the threat was neutralized and self-disassembled. Hahaha!

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: I- I did it?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: You did it.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Walks over to the droid)

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: This is what I was talking about. How many other twelve-year-olds do you think are capable of doing what you've just done.(Nods)

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Cut to Mabel in the attic, sadly, looking at scrapbooks.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Sighs)

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Walks in)Hey, everything all right, pumpkin?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Just can't believe the summer's almost over. And now that I know how awful high school's going to be, I'm in no hurry to start that train wreck.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Puts his arm around her shoulder)Ah, nobody likes gettin' older. But just because you're growing doesn't mean you have togrow up, you know? I mean, look at me. I'm pushin' seventy and Istilleat ice cream for dinner.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: But I don't wanna say goodbye to Gravity Falls.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Hey, at least whatever happens after this summer, you'll still have your brother along with you through thick and thin. Not everyone can say that, you know.(Noogies her and leaves)

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Yeah, at least when I go home I always have Dipper.(Picks up a picture of Dipper)Good ol', reliable ol'-

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Her walkie-talkie crackles.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Faint, over walkie-talkie:)Are you okay?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Faint, over walkie-talkie:)I'm fine.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Let's get you out of there.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Cut to Dipper and Ford.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Listen to me, Dipper: this town is a magnet for things that are special. And that includes you and me. It brought both of us here for a purpose! Stay here with me, Dipper. Become my apprentice. Don't let anyone hold you-(coughs)

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Offers him his hand)I'll do it; I'm gonna stay.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Excellent.(Grabs Dipper's hand and climbs out of the ditch)Now who wants to save the world, apprentice?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Walk away laughing)

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Dipper's walkie-talkie makes static noises.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Cut to the attic.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Comes in)Mabel! I just had the best day of my life! UFOs are real and there's one under the town and I saved Great-uncle Ford's life and- and...(Sees that Mabel is lying on her bed with her back to him, unmoving)Hey, are you okay?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Tell me it's not true, Dipper. Tell me you were joking.(Holds up the walkie-talkie, which emits static)Ford's apprentice? Seriously?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Look, I was thinking and... this is a huge opportunity for me.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Crying)Well it's a horrible opportunityfor me!I had the worst day of my life! When we turn thirteen, the summer ends, and I have to leave everything behind. You're the only person I can count on and nowyou'releaving metoo!?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Look, I've been thinking about it. I won't be gone forever, okay? I'll still visit you at home, and we'll chat online; we'll make it work.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: I don't want it to work. I just wish summer could last forever.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Walks over to her and puts his arm on her)But it can't, Mabel. Look, things aren't gonna stay frozen this way. It's part of growing up. Things change. Summer ends.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Yells and runs away)

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Ah!(Falls over, as he was leaning on her)Mabel, wait! I didn't mean it like that! Mabel, come back!

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Runs into the woods crying; sits under a tree, digs through the backpack)Only party chocolate can cheer me up now.(Holds up a notebook)Nerd books?(Holds up pens)Chewed up pens? Ugh, wrong backpack. It's not fair. I just wish summer could last forever.(Pulls her sweater over herself)

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (PossessingBlendin Blandin; offscreen)That might be possible!

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Sweatertown isnotaccepting incoming calls right now.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: M-M-M-Mabel, it's me.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: What? Who said that?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Walks up to her, adjusting camoflauge suit)I-I-I can help.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: The time travel guy? What are you doing here?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: You said you don't want summer to end, right? D-did-did I hear that right?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Yeah... why are you asking?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Look, maybe it's against the rules, but you once did a favor for me, so I thought I could help you out. It's called a time bubble, and it prevents time from going forward. Summer in Gravity Falls can last as long as you want it to!

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Wipes up tears)R-Really? But how does it work?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: I just need you to get a little gizmo for me from your uncle.(Wristwatch displays the rift)It's something small. He won't even know it's missing.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Huh. Maybe Dipper has something like that in his nerd-bag.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Cut to Ford in the lab. Dipper walks in.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Let me guess: Mabel didn't take it well?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: I don't know, maybe I'm making the wrong decision. I need to think about this.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Dipper, right now we need to focus on the mission. Now come on, I've got the glue; hand me the rift and let's make history.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Reaches into bag and pulls out birthday flyer)What? Oh no! The RIFT!

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Cut to Mabel in the woods.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Pulls the rift out of the backpack)Huh. That's... odd. This it?

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Yes, that's it! Just hand it over and I'll do my thing. Unless you're ready to leave Gravity Falls.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Just a little more summer.(Gives it to him)

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Oops.(Drops it and stomps on it, breaking it)

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: What?!

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Laughs maniacally, takes off goggles to reveal his eyes)

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Oh no! Wait, wait wait!

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Snaps fingers, making Mabel fall unconscious; leaves Blendin's body)At last! At long, long last! The gateway between worlds has opened! The eventone billion years prophesizedhas come to pass! The day has come!The world is finally mine! (Laughs maniacally as the rift tears reality into theNightmare Realm)

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Townspeople look on, worried. Wind blows. Dipper and Ford run out of the Mystery Shack.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: What's going on?! What is that?!

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: We're too late! It's the end of the world.

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: (Rises up, cackling maniacally)

episode: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
line: Zoom into Bill's eye; end credits: Dipper and Mabel's birthday flyer sits on the ground as lightning crackles and screams are heard. A helicopter is heard above and the flyer blows away.
Episode opens withBill Cipherlaughing evilly under the freedinterdimensional rift.
Oh, it's happening, It's finally, finally happening!(Continues laughing as what appears to be muscle fiber covers him)Physical form? Don't mind if I DO!(Is encased in a metal pyramid and vanishes)

Huh?! What just happened?(AsMabel Pinesis lifted up and locked into abubblewith hershooting star symbolon it)Oh. Oh man. This is bad! This is real bad!Guys, we've got a situation!(Presses a button on his watch, causing him to vanish)
Cut to downtown.
What the—?
(Gasps)
Wha?

(Laughs, deep voice:)ALRIGHT, LISTEN UP YOU ONE LIFESPAN, THREE DIMENSIONAL, FIVE SENSE SKIN PUPPETS!(Normal voice:)For one trillion years I've been trapped in my own decaying dimension, waiting for a new universe to call my own. Name's Bill! But you can call me your new lord and master for all of eternity!(Melts the statue ofNathaniel Northwest)
Ah!

Now meetthe gang of interdimensional criminals and nightmares I call my friends.(As they come out of the rift)8 Ball!Kryptos! The being whose name must never be said! Haha, what the heck. It'sZanthar. Then, of course, there's alsoTeeth,Keyhole,Hectorgon,Amorphous Shape,Pyronica,Paci-Fireandthese guys. This is our town now, boys!
Bill's friends rejoice.
Now see here, you unholy triangle fella. As mayor, I strongly urge you to git... git on out of here.
Yeah! Things with one eye are weird!
We don't like out-of-towners!
We punch what we DON'T UNDERSTAND!!(Rips open mailbox)
I would just like to say that as a rich capitalist I welcome your tyrannical rule. Perhaps I could be one of your, uh... horsemen of the apocalypse?
Dad!
Not now, sweetie, the grownups are talking.
Oh wow, that's a great offer. How 'bout instead I shuffle the functions of every hole in your face?(Snaps fingers; Preston's face becomes mixed up)
(Falls over, screaming as his family watches in horror)
(Laughs evilly as the townspeople flee, turns Durland to stone)
(Picks up Durland)Durland! My precious Deputy Durland. No!
(Takes Durland away)
It's time we do a little redecorating. I could really use acastleof some kind.(Apyramidforms in the sky)And how about somebubbles of PURE MADNESS?!(Colorful bubbles appear)
A bubble passes throughSprott, who rips off his shirt and screams madly.
This party never stops! Time is dead and has no meaning! Existence is upside-down and I reign supreme! WELCOME, ONE AND ALL, TOWEIRDMAGEDDON!
The water tower roars. Cut to remixedtheme song. Cut toDipperandFord Pinesin front of theMystery Shack.
So this is how the world ends. Not with a bang but with a... boop-boop.
Weirdmageddon.
Birds caw and fly over Ford and Dipper. Various animals and creatures follow them.
(Gets knocked over by a deer)Agh!
Move it, stretch.
Hey, we're scampering here!
(Lifts Dipper back up)Theriftis shattered. Bill'sworldis spilling into ours and every minute his powers grow stronger.
Mabel! The rift must have cracked inside her backpack. She must be in danger. I have to go find her.(Running, to the walkie talkie:)Mabel! Come in, Mabel! Mabel!

(Stops him)Dipper. Listen to me. We can find your sister soon, but first we have to stop Bill. If we can blast him back through the rip he came out of, we just might be able to stop him before his weirdness spreads across the entire globe.
Are you sure defeating Bill is even possible?
No. I'm not sure. But being a hero means fighting back even when it seems impossible. Will you follow me?
To the ends of the Earth.
Good. Because that's where we're heading. You also might want to step inside.
(Run inside)
Weirdness wave!
The wave washes over the Mystery Shack and overSoos' house, causing their barbecue grill to come to life and run away.
(Looking out of window)Ah! Abuelita! A tidal wave of madness just went over us!
(Offscreen)Oh, Soos, such an imagination.
(Turns around and sees that Abuelita has transformed into a chair)Ah! You've turned into a chair!
Why don't you have a seat and relax?
But what about you? And my friends?
I'll be fine. You go help the others.
When the universe is broken, only one handyman can fix it.(Kisses Abuelita and runs off)I'm coming for you, friends!
Time for a nap.(Reclines)
Cut to Stan nailing a sign to a tree.
(Grabs the tassel onStan Pines' fez)
Hey!
(Tears off the tassel and eats it)
That's it, goat! It's time I threw you off this property for good!
The wave comes over them and Gompers grows until he is as tall as the trees.
On second thought, I'm gonna run like a coward now.(Screams and runs away)
(Walks off)
Cut to thearcade. The wave washes over it and several video game characters break out the windows.
Ha! Freedom! Freedom to PUNCH!(Punches the air)
Cut toGravity Falls Maximum Security Prison.

Okay, inmates, time to review your finger paintings.(Looking at paintings)Good. Nice.(Gasps when he sees Gideon's painting, which is a torn paper with a knife in it and "Revenge" written on it and "Love" written next to a picture of Mabel; the man sighs)Gideon, does this look like someone who's ready to re-enter society?
Gideon's unappreciated in his time!
Oh, Ghost-Eyes, you're making me blush!
Gideon makes prison life worth living.
Gideon! Gideon!
(Eats a bit of the ceiling, making the rest crumble down and crush the counselor)
(Look outside and gasp at scene ofabnormal creatures)
(Looks at the three-headed bird which has landed on his hand, it then screeches)Oh my. Bill came through.
Cut to Bill and his friends downtown.
Ready to cause some havoc, boys?
(Laugh)
Behind Bill, Dipper looks out the church clock tower and Ford readies his rifle.
Ah, myquantum destabilizer. I've been waiting a long time to use this. We're only gonna have one chance to take this shot.(Aims it at Bill)Steady... steady... and...
The wave washes over them, making the bell come to life.
Woohoohoohoohoohoohoohoohoo!! I'm alive now!
(Fires, but only hits Bill's hat)Oh no!!
(Hat regenerates)Well, well, well, and here I thought today couldn't get anybetter!(Fires a beam at the tower, destroying it)
(Lying in the wreckage, bruised)Great-uncle Ford!

(Trapped under some wreckage, grunts)Dipper! Take my journals!(Slides the backpack to Dipper, who picks upJournal 3)Listen, I know of one other way to defeat Bill, it's-(Hears something behind him)Oh, no! Dipper! Run! Get down!
(Runs down the stair)
(Rises behind Ford with the six-fingered hand symbol in his eye)Good old six-fingers. I've been waiting an(Deep voice:)ETERNITY(Normal voice:)to have a chat face to face.(Lifts Ford up)
Wah!
Everyone, this armageddon wouldn't be possible without help from our friend here. Give him a six-fingered hand!
(Offscreen, clap and cheer)
(Comes around the corner of the church)
This brainiac is the one who builtthe portalin the first place! Ah, don't look so sour, Fordsy. It's not too late to join me. With that extra finger, you'd fit right in with my freaks.
I'll die before I join you! I know your weakness, Bill!
Oh, yeah?(Eye shows a question mark)And I know a riddle. Why did the old man do this?(Assumes a pose)
This?(Imitates Bill's pose)
(Shoots a laser at Ford, petrifying him)
(Gasps)
(Picks up the petrified Ford)Because I needed a new backscratcher!(scratches himself with Ford as he and his friends share a hearty laugh over it.)
(Growls)That'senough! (Comes out from behind building)Hand over my uncle! Or else!(Holds up Journal 3)

Now isn't. This.(Flies up to Dipper and his eye glows white; with a deep voice along with his normal voice:)INTERESTING?(Normal voice:)My old puppetis back for an encore. You thinkyoucan stop me?(Punches the air)Go ahead, Pine Tree, show me what you've got.
(Flipping through 3 and shining blacklight on it)I...uh... I... uh...(Sees that the Journal says "IF HE GAINS PHYSICAL FORM THEN ALL IS LOST!")
I UM I. Do it, kid. Do somebrilliantthing that takes me down right now. Whattdya got, Pine Tree, everyone's waiting. DO IT.
(Jumps at Bill)Augh, BILL!(His fist hits a force field in front of Bill's eye and he is thrown backward into a tree; he rubs his head)Ugh...
(Mockingly)Eww!
(Laughs)
Ha, ha, ha.
(Reaches for Journal 3)
(Levitates the Journals)That's right. Don't be a hero, kid.(Waves Ford)This is what happens to heroes in my world.(Burns the Journals)
NO!! THE JOURNALS!!
Not much of a threat now,areyou?(To his friends:)Now can anyone remind me why we came here?
To getweird!
THAT'S RIGHT! VIP party at theFearamid. Oh, and 8 Ball, Teeth, you've earned a treat, have the kid for a snack.
Huh?
(Rolls eyes)
Heheheheh.
Hench-maniacs, ROLL OUT!(Turns a car into a racecar-like vehicle)
(Get into the car)
Let's get out of here, Bill!
(Drives away, firing lasers, changing things as he goes, laughing maniacally)
(Stares at 8 Ball and Teeth, panting)
So, you wanna eat him, or, something?
Oh, definitely, let's eat him.
Ahhhhh!!!(Runs away as they follow him)

(On a television set that is lying among the wreckage)We are day three in this strange cataclysmic event, which some are calling "Weirdmageddon," or the "Oddpocalypse." Weather today calls for black clouds, blood rain and frequent showers of Eyeball Bats turning people into stone. I'm Shandra Jimenez and I ate a rat for dinner.
(TurnsPizza Guyinto stone and carries him away)

(Gets out from under some garbage bag and sees an Eyeball Bat following him)Huh!(Runs into an alley; into walkie talkie:)Mabel, it's me. So far I have eluded capture but I haven't been able to find you or Stan anywhere. I don't know if you can hear me, but wherever you are, whatever happens, I'm going to find you.
(Screeches and takes the "A" out of "MALLS" on theGravity Malls'sign)
The mall! Maybe they're hiding in there!(Runs to the mall and runs into the glass)Oh no!

Hey. Hey you. Hey, I wanna talk to you. I wanna talk to you about going inside my mouth. I- I think you wanna get in here.(Crawling toward Dipper)Hey, you, hey! I'm talkin' to you, man! You don't have to make a big deal outta this! Hello! HELLO!
(As he talks, forces himself through the mall's automatic doors, but gets stuck in them)
(Slaps the door, freeing Dipper)Why are you just ignoring me?(Reaches inside)That's seriously rude to just IGNORE someone like this.

(Backs into the food court)Stan! Mabel!(Sees nachos on a table)Huh, maybe at least I can get something to eat. The last nachos on Earth.(Picks them up and is trapped in a net)Ah! HELP! The nachos tricked me!
(Pokes her head out from a plant)Dipper?
Wendy!? Oh no! You've been transformed into some sort of... tree monster!

Ha! It's just camouflage. My dad made me andmy brothersdo apocalypse training every year instead of Christmas. Guess it's sort of cool their paranoia paid off.(Shoots a bat) Nice!Bat meat. Let me get that for ya.(Throws ax at the net, freeing Dipper)
Ah! Wendy, I'm so glad to find you!(Hugs her)I thought everyone I knew was gone.
Hey, hey, it's okay. We have each other now. AndToby Determined, who I accidentally mistook for a monster.
This just in: this arrow in my shoulder.

We shouldn't stay out in the open for too long. Let me show you my hideout.(Leads them to the Edgy on Purpose store, cooks the bat)We were playing Truth or Dare in the cemetary when it happened. The eyeballs frozeNate,Lee,TambryandThompson.(Presses a button on the cash register she's sitting on and takes some money to wipe her face with)Robbiealmost got away but had to pause to take a selfie. What about you?
I was in a fight with Mabel when it happened. Uncle Ford asked me to be his apprentice once the summer was over. But that would mean I wouldn't go back home. It would mean growing up without Mabel.
Oh,dude.
Mabel didn't take it well and she ran off into the forest. She couldn't even look me in the eye.
Come on. Let's get some fresh air. Toby, you watch the camp.
(Dressed in a bunch of the Edgy on Purpose clothes)Don't call me "Toby" anymore. Call me Bodacious T.
No one will ever call you that.
Ooh...
Cut to Dipper and Wendy outside.
End of the world. Man, those death metal album covers got it shockingly right.

You know, I used to think I could get out of anything, but this? The journals are destroyed, Ford is captured and I can't find my family anywhere. Bill said it himself, there's no room for heroes out here. We lost.
Look, dude, it's not over yet. You've beaten Bill twice before, why is this time any different?
'Cause then I had Mabel.

Then you need to get Mabel back. Look, this summer, I've seen some amazing things, but nothing as amazing as you and your sister. I don't know if it's dumb luck or yin and yang, or whatever, but when you two work together, there's like nothing you two can't accomplish. You just need to make up, and team up, and save the universe.
But how will I ever find her?
A monster eats a billboard, revealing the bubble with Mabel's shooting star on it at the cliffs.
The shooting star from Mabel's sweater! She's in there. I know it.
Whoa, it that like twin ESP?
No, we don't have that, but we do have this thing where our allergies totally act up at the same time.(Sneezes)Mabel needs us. But how are we gonna get out there without being caught?
I have an idea.
Cut to the fearamid, where the party is going on.
(Spinning a stone Lazy Susan)Spin the person! Spin the person!(Lazy Susan's head points at Pyronica)
Ah!(Flies away)
(Catches him with her tongue and swallows him)
(Laughs)Go nuts, guys! When we're done partying, I unveil phase two.
(Offscreen, pounding on door)Open up! This is the police. Time Police.
The demons all look at Bill.
Just play it cool, ditch the time-punch. Let me do the talking.
(The door is then destroyed, revealing the Time Paradox Avoidance Enforcement Squadron, accompanied byTime Baby, at the doorway)
(Steps forward)Bill Cipher. You are in violation of the rules of space-time and possessing the body of a time officer.
My body is a temple! How dare you!!
Hear this, Cipher!
Ugh, Time Baby.
(Projects a hologram of the universe)If your rip in this dimension continues, it could destroy the very fabric of existence!(The universe in the hologram explodes)Surrender now or face my tantrum!
Oh, no, a tantrum! Whatever will I do about that-HOW 'BOUT THIS?? BOOM.(Vaporizes the Time Baby and the police; eye turns into a mouth and blows the smoke off his finger)
Ah, snap! He just killed Time Baby!
Yeahhh!(Resume partying)
(Hiding)Aw, man, this has gone from bad to worse! I gotta get out of time-Dodge!(Disappears)
(Approaches with Teeth)Boss, the Pine Tree kid got away before we could eat him. Are you worried he might try to cause some trouble?
Yeah, trouble with Mabel's bubble?
Ha! I'm not worried. I've gotsomeone on the case.
Cut to the Bud Gleeful's auto-mart. Dipper, Toby and Wendy are looking over the fence.
The abandoned auto-mart. Free cars right for the hot-wiring. We just found our ride to Mabel. I wonder if they have a tank. I'vealwayswanted to drive a tank!
I can't believe this place is just abandoned.
(Looking into a car)Ooh, an air freshener. Finally I'll smell like a person. Stealy stealy...
A tranquilizer dart hits him.
Ah! It's gonna take more than one dart to keep me from-
Several more darts hit him and he collapses.
Oh no! Tony! Was it Tony? I can never remember his name.
Three car headlights turn on in front of them. Three giant cars, each with prisoners inside, surround them.
Well, well, looks like we got ourselves a pair of ground walkers.
Heheh! Ground walkers! Heheh! Ain't got no wheels!
(Laugh)
ListenDiscount Auto Warriors!
We just wanna make it to that bubble out east; we have no quarrel with you!
(With a voice-lowering megaphone:)Oh, but that's where you're wrong! Hands where I can see 'em.
(Hold up hands)
Y'all fellers ain't goin' nowhere.
"Y'all?"
"Fellers?" Wait... Gideon!?
That's Sheriff Gideon!(Without megaphone:)Under the authority of Bill Cipher, I place you two under arrest! Oh, hi, Wendy! Have we formally met?
Prisoners lead Dipper and Wendy to Gideon, who is standing on the back of a truck.
Wooooo-we! Look what the apocalypse dragged in! Y'all are in a twelve-piece bucket of deep fried trouble now! Ghost-Eyes! Spitoon!(Spits gum out into spitoon)
Ugh, it's Gideon.
And he's gotten folksier.

Ma' old pal Bill figured you might try to rescue Mabel. So he appointed me, master of these wastelands, andkeeper of the bubble!My sweet precious Mabel's trapped inside and I HAVE THE ONLY KEY!(Shows them a key with the shooting star symbol on it)Wrapped around my... well I wouldn't call it a neck exactly, wrapped around this little pocket of fat under ma' head?
Gideon, you haveno rightto keep her in there!

Bill explained it to me nice and simple: she was always destined to be mine!(Takes a newspaper article from when he was dating her from his hat)And now that I have her in a cage she'll learn to love me! I have an eternity to wait! Ghost-Eyes! Ready to escort our friends to Bill's dungeon?
(Picks Dipper and Wendy up)
Uh! No! Hey!
This isn't gonna work, Gideon.
Oh? And why's that?
Cause after I break Ghost-Eyes' arm and steal that key from your neck, I'm gonna wear your butt on my foot like a rhinestone slipper!
(Laugh)
Oho, and what makes you think you can do all that?
'Cause I'm a flippin' CORDUROY!(Flips over Ghost-Eyes' arm and pulls him back)
(Falls on the ground and ducks, tripping Ghost-Eyes)
(Run away)
Ghost-Eyes! My hench-angel!
Ha!(Grabs Gideon and rips the key from his neck, to prisoners:)Get back! Get back! Or I will drop-kick him, I swear!(Breaks a car window and unlocks it)
You'll never get away with this, ya hear me?!
Guess what? We already DID!(Kicks Gideon into the other prisoners)
(Getting into the car behind her)Wendy, you're the coolest person I know.
I know, dude. Tell me about it later.(Drives away)
After them!
(Get into cars)
(Carrying Gideon into a car)You want your baby seat?
Yes, please.
(Buckles him into a carseat)
(Over a microphone:)We are not letting 'em get Mabel! Discount Auto-mart Warriors, rollout!
(Drive away, cheering)
Okay, all we have to do is outrace Gideon's henchmen, unlock the bubble, save Mabel, save the world.(Sees that Wendy had hit a mailbox)Quick question: did you ever get your driver's license?
Definitely not. Arm!(Swerves to avoid The Horrifying Sweaty One-Armed Monstrosity)
Ah!
(Grabs one of the cars)
Uhahhhhh!(screams this as windshield cracks)
(Eats the car)
Swerve swerve!(Ghost-Eyes Swerves to avoid the arm)I can't let 'em free Mabel!
Remind me why you're keeping your girlfriend in a prison bubble again? Have we, the prisoners, become the wardens?
SHE LOVES ME! She just doesn't know it yet. Now quit the philosophy.
Sorry. Itwasmy major.
The cars drive toward some bubbles.
Ha! Weirdness bubbles blockin' the path! WOOOOWEE we got 'em now.
Watch it! Go around that bubble field!
No way around! Hold on! We're goin' through!
What's even in there?!
(Scream as they enter a bubble, then they have the heads of birds)
(Chirping, subtitled:)For some reason, I really want worms right now.
(Chirping, subtitled:)Eat worms! Fly south! Nest!
The car exits the bubble and Dipper and Wendy are normal again.
(Coughing up feathers)Oh, that was horrible!
Here comes another one, dude! Brace yourself!(Drives through three more bubbles)
(Screaming, they become anime-styled, then they are made out of meat products, then they become live-action)
(Screaming, they become made of 3D blocks, female versions of themselves in dresses and make-up, and old-fashioned silent cartoon versions of themselves, a card comes up that says:)"AAAAAAAAAUGH!"
Both the cars are back to normal. Ghost-Eyes slams his truck against Wendy's car, breaking the glass.
Ah!
Wendy, we're almost there! We just have to make that jump!
Total lack of driver's training, don't fail me now.(Accelerates and drives off the cliff, screaming as the car flies through the air)
The car hits the ground and rolls. When it stops, the passenger door opens and Dipper falls out.
So... close.(Crawling)Mabel... I'm... almost there.(Stops in front of a figure in a cloak)
(Offers him his hand and pulls back his hood)Heya, Dipper. How's it hanging?
Soos!
(Stands up from behind the car, bruised)Soos?
Handyman of the apocalypse, at your service.
Soos! How'd you, where'd you-?

I've been wandering the plains like a desperado, helping strangers. I guess there's some folk songs about me now?(Looking at Wendy's arm)Let me see what the damage is, here. Ah, well the good news is: your arm is okay.
So what's the bad news?
Bad news is we're surrounded, dudes.
The prisoners have surrounded them, cheering.

Wooowee. I dare say y'all almost had the jump on me there for a second. But this ain't yourGravity Fallsanymore! Out here, I win.(Claps and gets thrown a conch, which he blows)Bill's henchbats will be here any minute to retrieve y'all. MABEL'S MINE NOW! Hahahaha!
Is she?
Well, yeah. I have her trapped, ergo, Mabel is MINE!
Gideon, listen to me, if I've learned anything this summer it's that you can't force someone to love you.(Looking at Wendy)The best you can do is strive to be someone worthy of loving.
Oh, I'm worthy o' lovin'! These prisoners love me!
(Cheer)

But Mabel doesn't. Because you're selfish. But you can change! Bill thinks there's no heroes in this world, but if we work together and fight back, wecandefeat him. You wanna be Mabel's hero? Stand up to Bill, and let us save her!
That's crazy! You know what Bill would do to me if that happens?
What, you scared of Bill?
No, I ju... it's a complicated situation.
Look inside, Gideon. If all this is for Mabel, then ask yourself what Mabel would want you to do.
(Looks at the newspaper article, looks at the picture of him and Mabel together, with him smiling and Mabel looking unconformable, quietly:)Dipper. Will you tell her what I did?
Of course.

I hope you're right about this.(To the prisoners:)Guys, new plan! Bill's minions are gonna be on us in seconds. But I'm not gonna let that dumb triangle be the warden o' me! Y'all ready for a good old fashioned prison brawl?
We're behind you for life, brother!
Fighting children is boring, but fighting a chaos god sounds fun!
Lets do this!(As the prisoners drive toward the fearamid)Henchmen, rollout!
(Cheer)
Whew! And I thought I was gonna have to throw down!
Cut to Dipper, Soos and Wendy in front of Mabel's bubble.
Okay, remember, guys. This is a prison bubble designedbyBill. We've got to prepare ourselves for what we find in here.
Whatever it is, we'll do it together. For Mabel!(Puts his hand in the center)
(Puts her hand on top of his)For Mabel!
(Puts his hand on top of theirs)For Mabel.(Unlocks the padlock and the chains fall to the ground)
Dipper, Soos and Wendy hold hands and enter the bubble. The screen fades to white and "TO BE CONTINUED" appears on the screen. Credits: cut to The Horrifying Sweaty One-Armed Monstrosity downtown.
Anybody wanna get in my mouth? I'm a big mo—hungry monster—I'm a big hungry monster here! I would really appreciate it, if someone—you, ma'am, you ma'am, how would you like to get in my—
(Offscreen, screams)

Anybod- hello! Hey, hey, sir, sir! Eh, false alarm. It's just a bird. Not one person. Not one person has... gotten in my mouth. I don't care anymore. I just...(Sighs, begins to crawl away)I gotta call my mother.
End.
Opens to a squirrel scampering before being eaten by a mailbox.

End times are here, folks. Only way to salvation is to embrace the triangular ways of our overlord. Any object with more than three sides is sinful.(Manly Danholds up a triangular section of a stop sign that he cut)That's it. That's probably whatBillwants.
AnEye-Batcomes and Manly Dan screams as he is turned to stone.
I reckon I've been livin' a lie.(Screams as he is turned to stone and then carried away by the Eye-Bat)
Cut to theFearamid. Bill Cipher taps a fork on the still-petrifiedFord Pinesand the music stops.
Ladies, gentlemen, that creature with like eighty-seven different faces.
Eighty-eight different faces!

Whoa-ho, sorry - touchy subject. Anyways, it's been fun turningGravity Fallsinside out, rounding up all its terrified citizens and then stacking them into this massivethroneof frozen human agony. (The last word echoes; sits on the throne)Don't worry, they're not conscious anymore. Probably.
(Tranquilizes)Uh, my omelettes. They-they have friendly faces.

Whoops. Hehe, back, back you go there.(Pokes Lazy Susan back into place and she turns back to stone)But Gravity Falls is just the beginning. It's time to take our chaos worldwide! Alright boys, to the corners of the Earth. Set the world aflame with your weirdness. This dimension is ours!(Bill's friends come out of the Fearamid)Ah, global domination. I could get used to...(the demons hit something invisible to the naked eye and fall down)WHAT??!!!(Goes out to investigate and pokes what his friends hit; the shot pans out to show that the whole town is surrounded by an invisible forcefield, containing the rift and Bill's chaos)Hmm, this might be more complicated than I thought.
I think I broke something.
Walk it off!
Cut to the shortenedWeirdmageddontheme song. Scene opens on thePrison Bubbleand zooms in, showingDipper Pines,Soos RamirezandWendy Corduroyinside the bubble.

Mabel! Mabel! Okay guys, Bill has taken over the town and if his weirdness spreads he's gonna take over the whole world. Our first step to stopping him is rescuing Mabel, but he's got her trapped in this strange prison bubble.
Whatisthis place anyway?
The ground starts cracking with rainbow-colored fractures; Soos, Dipper and Wendy scream as they fall.
Guys, if I die, I wanna die hugging.(Grabs Dipper and Wendy in a hug)
Soos, you're choking me.
Let my body be your shield!
Continued screaming until the three land on a bouncy-house.
Huh? Is the entire ground a bouncy castle?
Do you hear '80s music?
And does the air smell like childlike wonder?
(Look out at Mabeland)Whoa.
This is Mabel's prison?
(Holding up Mabel's letter with every box checked, excitedly:)Yes. Definitely. Absolutely.

It's fun-o'clock everyone. Today's weather calls for rainbows with a chance of dance parties. If you are the owner of a unicorn with a top hat, please come to the ice cream beach. Your unicorn is being towed.
What is this new world? Shining, shimmering, splendid.
A pineapple runs screaming asXyler and Crazdrive up and almost run it over while a hippopotamus jumps through a nearby window.
Welcome to Mabeland.
And this is worse than the apocalypse.
Dude, this place hurts my eyes.
Oh that's normal. Mabeland's rainbows have colors only bees and art students can see. Now who wants to go on the grand tour?
Do we have a choice?
No!
They begin driving with Dipper, Soos and Wendy in the car.
Mabeland is the ultimate paradise and the only rule: there are no rules.
Except for one rule which is very serious. But no one would ever break it, so it's not worth mentioning.
Yeah!
Listen creepy dream guys, we're not here to party, okay? We just need to find Mabel and get her out of here. Where is she?
Our home girl Mabel lives at our next stop.(The car crashes through a building, hits a fire hydrant, and skids through the street)
No rules!
They arrive at a beach.
Now, come have rad snacks served by awesome penguins.
Penguins walk up with trays full of food and drinks.
(Takes a drink)Oh, score! I'm so hungry.
(Takes a drink)Yeah, I haven't eaten anything except for part of my hat for the last three days.
(Clink cups)
Hah!

Can you guys just hold on a second? Do you see what's happening here? Don't forget this world was created byBill.(Slaps Soos' drink away as he is about to drink from it)That punch is probably blood! And that glitter rain(A cloud of glitter appears over him)is probably ground up bones, or babies, or something.(Collects some glitter in his hand and drops it)Bill's using Mabel's own fantasies as some sick trap. We need to grab Mabel and get the heck out of here.
Oh, Mabel? She's at the top of the tallest tower guarded by those big buff waffle guards.
There's no way to get past them!
Someone hand me some syrup.(Jumps on a guard from behind and starts to eat him)
Aaah! It's happening! The moment we've trained for!
Oh, don't worry, man! I've got ya-(Screams as face is punched out by Wendy)
It's now or never, guys!
Cut to the inside of the tower, where several animals are frolicking.
(Punch open the doors)
This is a rescue! Everyone hit the deck!
(Picks up one of the animals and throws it, then follows Dipper and Wendy up the stairs)Hang in there, Mabel!
(Burst through the doors to the bedroom)
There she is! Soos! Grab her! Wendy, barricade the door!(Wendy does so)
(Picks up Mabel, who is sleeping)Up you go, little lady.
(Wakes up)Soos? Wendy? Dipper?
(As swords are being poked through the door)The waffles are coming back! We gotta hurry!
Uh, guys?
Don't worry, Mabel, we'll get you out of this!

But, Dipper!(Claps twice and lifts everything in front of the door off the ground. She puts everything down in order and seats Dipper, Soos and Wendy on some chairs - the guards come in and point their spears at them; she claps and they stop)
Mabel! What are you doing? We're trying to save you from this prison!
This isn't a prison! I made this world!(Claps and the lights come on)Well, I sort of woke up here. It's complicated.
What are you saying?
(Reveals a plaque that says "MAYOR MABEL")I'm saying this is my home now. And I don't want to be saved!
(Flies into the window and bumps the windowpane)Sorry, Mabel.
No worries, Bubble Bear.
Commercial break.
You didwhat?!

Look, after you said you wouldn't come back home with me at the end of the summer for your "apprenticeship," I wanted to hide in my sweater forever. But then I woke up in a place that gives me exactly what I wanted: an endless summer where we'll never have to grow up! Here the sun shines all day, the party never ends, and now that you guys are here, it's finally perfect!
Listen, Mabel, we're not here to party. All of this is crazy!
Ugghh. I figuredyoumight say something like that, Dipper. That's why I prepared a backup Dipper with a more supportive attitude.

(Rides in on a skateboard)Wohoho!(High fives Mabel)Yeah! Wiggity-wiggity-what's up, dude-bros? I'm Dippy Fresh! I like skateboarding, supporting my sister, and punctuating every sentence with a high five! Hup!(Holds up hand)
Oh! Don't mind if I-
(Clears throat)
I'm sorry, I can't leave him hanging! Yus!(High fives Dippy Fresh)
You're dead to me, Soos.

Trust me, you guys are gonna love it here. This world always knows what you want. Sometimes even before you do!(A chinchilla drops into her arms)Apparently I wanted a chinchilla! Right again, Mabeland!
Mabel, listen to yourself. This is crazy! I'm sorry about our fight, and I'm sorry things aren't great right now but that doesn't mean you can just stay in here forever!
Hey, take a chill pill! Those grow on trees here!
YOU STAY OUT OF THIS, DIPPY FRESH!
Dude, calm down. Dippy Fresh didn't do anything to you, dawg.
(Growls at Dippy Fresh)

I know it sounds too good to be true, but just give this place a chance! Mabeland knows just what you want and always provides!(Claps and Dipper, Soos and Wendy's clothes go back to normal. A flying hamburger goes up to Soos)
(Bites it)Pudding center. Nice!
Uh, actually, Mabel, I'm with Dipper on this. Gravity Falls is in trouble, and I really think-
(Honks horn and drives up with Wendy's friends in a monster truck)
Wendy!
Wha- guys? You're safe!
We've got a monster truck full of fireworks, fake IDs, and pranking supplies.
Wanna drive this truck to the high school and glue this plunger to the principal's head?
(Eyes sparkling)Yes. Yes, I do. Sorry, guys, I've always wanted to do that. I'll be back in just a few minutes.(Gets in truck)
(Drive away, cheering)
Wendy?!
Don't worry, dude. There's nothing in this world that could break me from our mission.
A muscular man with a wrestling mask and a champion belt that says "PAPI" enters.
Soos, mijo. I have returned.
Holy- whoa, whoa. Dad?
You don't remember what I look like, so I have the body of a pro wrestler and a face you once saw on a hot sauce bottle. I was never there for you, but in this world, I can be.
You're perfect!
It's a trap! Don't go with him, Soos! No matter what he offers you!
(Holds up ball and baseball glove)Want to play catch?
I'm sorry, dude. Even if it is all a dream, I've gotta play just one game. Hahaha! Come on, Dad!(Chases the ball his "dad" throws)
(To Mabel:)Okay, this has gone too far! You can't honestly think these fantasies are good for anyone!

You can't argue with the results: people are happy here! Does it really matter if it's real or not? For once, stop listening to your head and listen to your heart. Mabeland has something for everyone! Even you! In fact:(A door begins to open)
Nope. Not looking.Not looking. (Leaves)
Cut to theFearamid. The demons groan.

Alright, can anybody explain to me why, even with our newfound INFINITE POWER,(Lightning strikes the columns)none of us can escape the borders of this STUPID HICK TOWN?!?!(Sits in throne)There's some kind of force field keeping us in, but who would know how to fix it?(Holds Ford)Hmm. Maybesomeoneneeds to come out of retirement.(Eye flashes Journal pages)
Bill!(Bill's eye back to normal)Uh, sorry, Boss, butGideonlet the Pines family escape! They're inside Mabel's bubble as we speak!

(Laughs smugly)Buddy, Mabel's bubble is the most diabolical trap I've ever created. It would take a will of titanium not to give into its temptation. Fetch me Gideon and take the rest of the day off. Things just got a little more interesting.
Cut to Mabeland. Dipper is standing in front of a river.
(Singing:)Bum ba bum bo, I'm a stuffed animal tree...
(Singing:)We're the stuffed animals, tee-hee-hee!

(Angrily throws a stone across the river; it skips while a child's giggling is heard)Ugh, even my stone skips are perfect!(Sighs)Who am I kidding? Maybe Mabel's right. It's a horror show out there. At least the air here is breathable.
Dude, you're talking to a river.
Oh, hey, Wendy, what's up? I thought you were busy wrecking the school or whatever.
Yeah, that got old quick. And this music is really starting to get on my nerves. I think that stuff you said about this place is right.
Really? Well, now we just need a plan.

Don't worry, you always think of something.(Throws stone, and it skips while giggles are heard, the stone explodes in the sky and a screen pops up that says "100 POINTS")You know, you're so much smarter than like everyone else. Heh. It's kinda funny. If you were older, you'd be like, my dream guy.
Wait, do you really mean that?

Wait a minute. In this place you can be any age you want! If we were the same age(Pulls a flower farther out of the ground so that it is as tall as the flower next to it)maybe you and me could, I don't know, actually be together.
Wait, really?!
I bet, if we ask Mabel, she could do it right now! In this place it could finally be just you and me. Come on, man! Just take my hand.(Holds out hand and winks)
Wait, aaahhh,... this isn't real!
The Fake Wendy turns into a bunch of centipedes and the sky darkens.
(Screams as Fake Wendy dissolves)
You shouldn't have done that, Dipper!!We're watching you.
(They now each have one giant eye)THERE ARE EYES EVERYWHERE.
The sky brightens again.Sev'ral Timezrides by on a long bike.
(Each band member one after another:)Hey Dipper!
(Singing:)Dup a dup dup, I'm a stuffed animal treeee~
(Backs away, panting)Oh my gosh. This is crazy. Um- I'm losing my mind. We have to get out of here. We have to go back. To the real. WORLD!("World" echoes)
The people on the streets turn to Dipper and gasp.
(Gasps)
(Tackle Dipper)
Hey!
Under Article Smiley Face of Exhibit Squeaky Duck, you are hereby accused of breaking our one rule: mentioning reality.
The crowd mutters.
Prepare to be banished from this land FOREVER.
A portal to the real world opens.
MABEL! You're smarter than this! Bill has you hypnotized or something! Are you really gonna let them banish me?!
No! Of course not; that's my brother, guys! There's gotta be another way.
Very well. If Dipper wishes to stay, he must plead his case in the ultimate trial. Of fantasy vs. reality.
(Takes a bite out of the guard)
Hey! Seriously?
(Pointing to a stuffed rhino)It was him.
Cut to the courtroom. Soos and Wendy are sitting in the crowd.Duck-tectivelands near Soos and grabs his shirt. Dipper and Mabel are sitting at a table near the front.
Seriously, Mabel? You're letting them take our argument to court?
Hey, I didn't make the rules in Mabeland.
Yes, you did! There's a tapestry of you making the rules!(Gestures to the tapestry)
All rise! For the honorableJudge Kitty Kitty Meow Meow Face-Shwartstein.

character: Judge Kitty Kitty Meow Meow Face-Shwartstein
line: (Emerges from his hole in the bottom of the catscratcher and climbs to the top and bangs his squeaky mallet)Order! Order! This trial begins right meow!(Sees string hanging from ceiling and bats it)Ooh! Hahaw! Oh!
(Clears throat)Judge?

character: Judge Kitty Kitty Meow Meow Face-Shwartstein
line: Sorry, sorry.(Clears throat)We are here to try Dipper Pines in the case of fantasy vs. reality.(The words "FANTASY," written in fancy handwriting, and "REALITY," written like a stamp, appear next to him)If Dipper wins, Mabel will return with him to the real world! But if he loses he will be banished forever! And replaced with town darling, Dippy Fresh!(Points at Dippy Fresh, who is standing next to the catscratcher)Dippy, come on out.
Flip-a-dip-dip!(Poses)
(Pounds table)I hate him. So. Much!

character: Judge Kitty Kitty Meow Meow Face-Shwartstein
line: The final decision will be made by a jury of your peers.
(Claps and six copies of herself appear in the jury stand)
Hi, there! Iloveyour headband!
Shut your mouth, I loveyourheadband!
We're all wearing the same headband!
(Laugh)HEADBAND!
Look, Mabel, this whole thing is ridiculous. But if winning a trial is what it takes to get you to come home with us, then so be it.
I'm sorry, Dipper, but I can only speak through my legal team now.
(Enter, wearing suits with the sleeves cut off)
We have a doctorate degree in hunkiness!
Also criminal and international law.

character: Judge Kitty Kitty Meow Meow Face-Shwartstein
line: Let's hear openin' statements.
Your honor, townsfolk, lovely ladies of the jury.
Oh, he's talking about us!
(Laugh)
(Falls out of her seat)
We're not that lovely.

My case is simple: this very unrighteous dude thinks that reality is better than fantasy.(A board appears and he points at it with a stick)But reality is bogus, lame and whack.(The words "BOGUS," "LAME," AND "WHACK" appear on the board as he says them)
Objection your honor, that's conjecture.

character: Judge Kitty Kitty Meow Meow Face-Shwartstein
line: Meowverruled.

I'd like to show you this "reality" that Dipper loves so much, and show you how it has wronged my client, and Dipper, their entire lives.(Takes a book titled "Mabel Memories" from a case Craz is holding)Exhibit A.
The crowd mutters.
Mabel's scrapbook.(Opens it)Second grade. October tenth.(The scene changes to a parking lot in front ofEggbert Elementaryin autumn)
Photo day.
Dipper and Mabel, in second grade, are sitting in a chair with some other kids getting their picture taken.
(In flashback, sniffs)Darn allergies.

(In flashback, puts on a slap bracelet; her arm is covered with them)Boom! A million slap bracelets! I'm gonna have the best photo ever! And how d'you like my new pigtaaailllls?(Waves her head back and forth)
Have fun, brat!(Puts gum in her hair)
Other kids laugh.
Ah! Gum! You ruined my hair! Dipper, what do I do?
Um, well, I, um. I don't-
(Runs away crying)
Mabel, wait!
Mabel's fantasy was having a great school photo, but reality had other plans.
(In present:)Look, that was one bad day!
One of many. February fourteenth, fourth grade. Valentine's Day.
Oh, come on, man, you can't.
Scene changes to Dipper and Mabel in fourth grade in their classroom. Mabel has a bag full of Valentine's cards.
How many valentines did you get, Dipper?
(In flashback, shakes his bag, but nothing comes out)
Oh, hey, haha! Dipper didn't get any! Oh, man, I thoughtIwas the class loser! Hey, everyone, Dipstick didn't get any!
(Laughing and chanting:)Dipstick! Dipstick! Dipstick!
(Runs out, crying, then trips over a wastebasket)
(To Mabel:)I can't believe that kid's your brother.
Scene changes to the courtroom.
(In present:)Hey, what's the point of all this? That was in the past!

Is your life any better now, bro?(Mabel's Scrapbook flashes to Dipper sitting on the log by himself inInto the Bunker)Heartbreak.(Flashes to Dipper lying against the tree inWeirdmageddon Part 1)Disaster.(Flashes to Mabel yelling at Dipper inDipper and Mabel vs. the Future)Broken promises. That's reality for you.
Out there, it's nothing but heartbreak. But in here, who wants pug sundaes?!(Sundaes appear in the hands of all the Jury Mabels)
(Lick the sundaes in unison)
Hand me a microphone, Xyler.
(Gives him a microphone)
(Drops it)
Totally righteous, bro!
Are we brothers?
I dunno!

character: Judge Kitty Kitty Meow Meow Face-Shwartstein
line: (Batting string)Well, I think we're ready for a verdict.
Wait! I haven't even presented my case!

character: Judge Kitty Kitty Meow Meow Face-Shwartstein
line: Do you even have a case?
(Looks at Mabel, who is rocking in her chair and singing to herself, then goes up to the judge)Yes, I do, your honor. I call as a witness: Mabel Pines!
The crowd gasps.
Uh... objection?

character: Judge Kitty Kitty Meow Meow Face-Shwartstein
line: I'll allow it. Us cats are famously curious. Meow meow.
(Walks up and sits in the chair while the crowd mutters)

(Sighs)Mabel, listen. I might not have all the answers. I'm not stylish(gestures to Xyler and Craz)and I'm not cool(gestures to Dippy Fresh, who is crowdsurfing)and I can't make pugs appear out of thin air.(Snaps fingers)
Booo!
What, come on!
Guilty!
But I know one thing well, and that's you. And I know that although you might act like it, you don't wanna be in this fantasy world.
Uh, pffsh, yeah right.
You're scared. Of growing up. And who could blame you; I'm scared, too.
Uh,(covers ears)Lalalalalala, I'm not listening! Guards!(Claps)The fingers!(The guards stick foam fingers in her ears)

Look, real life stinks sometimes, okay, I'm not gonna lie. But there's a better way to get through it than denial, and that's with help from people who care about you. It's how we've gotten through our whole lives. Just look.(Scene changes to the photo day after Mabel got gum in her hair; in flashback:)Mabel! I figured out a way to fix your photo!
(In flashback:)What? You have a wig?
No! But, I have a razor!(Shaves a line down his head)
Haha! You're crazy!(Takes the razor and shaves the part of her hair with gum in it)
(Laugh and pose for picture)Haaa!
(In present, takes the foam fingers away from her ears)
(Scene changes to Dipper in the closet after he got no Valentines)
(In flashback, slides a bunch of valentines taped into a heart that says "For My Favorite Brother" under the door)

(Scene changes back to courtroom, in present:)We've always been there for each other.(Flashes the scrapbook to Dipper giving Mabel a Band-Aid inSummerween, then to them fist-bumping inSock Opera, then to Mabel lowering them down from the cliff with hergrappling hookinGideon Rises)Mabel, I thoughtyouwere living a fantasy, but look at me! I actually thought I was gonna stay here and be Ford's apprentice! Spend my entire teens cooped up in a basement with a labcoat? How ridiculous is that? I don't know what's gonna happen in the future, but whatever it is, you don't have to fear because we'll do it together. I'm not taking Ford's apprenticeship. We've traveled to Heck and back to get you and we're goin' back together. Leave this fantasy world. Let's beat Bill and grow up together.
Crowd mutters.

character: Judge Kitty Kitty Meow Meow Face-Shwartstein
line: ORDER!(Bangs mallet)ORDER IN THE COURT, DANG IT! Why is this hammer squeaky?!
You mean it? You're really coming home with me?
Yes. Definitely. Absolutely. Awkward sibling hug?
Crowd shrieks.
Just don't do it!
DON'T DO IT!

character: Judge Kitty Kitty Meow Meow Face-Shwartstein
line: You do this and it's all over!
Sincere sibling hug.(Hugs Dipper)

character: Judge Kitty Kitty Meow Meow Face-Shwartstein
line: DON'T DO THE PATS!
(Pat each other)Pat pat.(A ripple comes from their spot, blowing Judge Kitty Kitty Meow Meow Face-Shwartstein's wig away and one of the benches falls over. All of the jurors disappear)
(Rubs eyes)Aw, man, I never noticed how bright this place is, ugh! Have I actually been listening to the same song for an entire week?

character: Judge Kitty Kitty Meow Meow Face-Shwartstein
line: (Meows in a distressed manner)
Whoa, time to calm you down.(Claps twice)Uh, why isn't this working?(Claps)

character: Judge Kitty Kitty Meow Meow Face-Shwartstein
line: Because your reign over this land isOVER!(Splits open and reveals a nightmarish pile of yarn)
The crowd turns dark gray and their eyes glow red.
(Hug each other and yell)
We gotta get out of here!
Soos! Wendy! Paradise is canceled!
The humans run away as the whole world turns gray.
Everyone get on!
They get onWaddles, who is the size of an elephant.
(Slaps him and he wakes up)Take us to freedom, Giant Waddles! Yah!
(Runs away)

Alright, guys, are you ready for this?(Grabs a giant knitting needle)Sorry, Mabeland. It's time to burst your BUBBLE!(As Waddles jumps, she breaks the bubble with the needle; the bubble explodes into confetti; she is lying on the ground of the cliff)Ugh. You all good, everyone good?
Waddles shrinks back to his normal size. Everyone is wearing the clothing they were wearing before.
(Hug her)
We've missed you, Mabel.
Hey, Dipper? I appreciate what you said back there, but if you want to take Ford's apprenticeship, I won't get in your way.
Psh. And miss out on your awkward teen years? You wish.(Laughs)
(Laughs)Man, I went nuts back there. I mean come on. The real world can't be that bad, right?(Looks the other way and seesGompersis still giant and the Fearamid)Oh boy.
Cut to everyone at ground level.
Where is everyone?
The town's deserted.
Did Bill already win?
Come on, guys. Let's see if we can still go hide out in the Shack.
Cut to theMystery Shack.
Yes! It's in shambles! Just like we left it.
Oh, man, this is the first time I've ever felt happy going to work.
(As they are running to it)Hello, house. Hello, porch. Hello, wads of gum I left stuck to the couch.
(Reaches for the handle, then stops when he hear scuffling)Wait, what was that? Shh.(Picks up a golf club)
(Aims crossbow)
(Pounds fist)
(Holds up grappling hook)
Let's get 'em, dudes.
(Kicks open the door)
(Run in)Yaaahh!!

character: Celestabellebethabelle,Chutzpar,Bats Biker,Woodpecker guy,Candy,Stan Pines,Grenda,Sheriff Blubs,Pacifica Northwest,Old Man McGucketand someGnomes
line: Yaaaahhhh!!
Stan?
Kids?
(Flushes toilet and comes out with a cardboard roll)Just so everyone knows, we're out of toilet paper. Did I miss something?
Cut to end credits. Xyler and Craz emerge from a pile of confetti.
Woah! We survived!
Where are we?
(Sit on a bench)
Are we real? Is this reality? Jean-Paul Sartre postulated that every existing thing is born without reason, prolongs itself out of weakness, and dies by chance.
Totally righteous, bro.
I know!
Episode opens where "Weirdmageddon 2: Escape From Reality" left off.
(Run into theMystery Shack)Yaaahh!!

character: Celestabellebethabelle,Chutzpar,Bats Biker,Woodpecker guy,Candy Chiu,Stan Pines,Grenda Grendinator,Sheriff Blubs,Pacifica Northwest,Old Man McGucketand somegnomes
line: Yaaaahhhh!!
Wait.
Grunkle Stan!(Run to him)
Kids! I can't believe it! I thought I lost you two!
(Hugs Stan)Mr. Pines! It's really you! I've been hugging strangers to practice for this moment.
(Slams into Stan for a hug)We missed you, you old codger!
(Chuckles)I've missed you knuckleheads, too. It's good to have you back.
So...what's everyone doing here?(Gasps as someLilliputtiansrun past him)
Yeah there's like monsters and gnomes, and is Pacifica wearing a potato sack?
Hey! Even in a sack I still look better than you.
It's...it's a long story.
(In the vents)Hey, is anyone gonna feed me? Larry King's disembodied wax head wants num-nums.
We're trying to ration our food, remember?(As Wax Larry King chews on her hair)Uhhh...it's happening again.
(Closes the vents)
(Looking out the door)Hey, everyone!Eye-bat!
Everyone gasps.
Evasive maneuvers!
(Slams the door and grabs Dipper and Mabel)Shhh, keep it down.
The refugees scatter.
Hit the lights!
Outside, an eye-bat turns a scampering raccoon into stone and flies off with it. Cut totheme song.
(Lights a match and throws it into a can, illuminating the shack, revealing the people sitting around the room)Welcome to what's left of normal around here. Home base.
The screen pans across the various people hiding in the Mystery Shack.
(As a gnome pulls a dart out of him)Ow!
We have...
(Singing:)Several injuries!(Clutch their injuries)Oh, ow...
Ow, my liver, girl!
Ah!Rumble McSkirmish?
Do not be afraid.Weirdmageddonhas taught me, there are some battles I cannot win. I am now Humble McSkirmish.(A digital "-50 despair" pops up next to Rumble)
Grunkle Stan, how'd this all happen?

So I was hammering signs out back when the sky started vomiting nightmares. I listen to a lot of AM radio so I knew what this meant: the end of the world.(Flashback of Stan running inside as the weirdness wave descends)What I didn't expect was what happened next.(The totem pole comes to life and attempts to attack the house, but hits a dome around it)Turns out whatever you and my brother did to the shack with yourunicornvoodoo made the crazy place invincible to weirdness.(The totem pole falls over; cut back to the present.)
Of course, the unicorn spell. That's why this is the only placeBill'smagic can't touch.

(Gesturing toOld Man McGucket)That's when Possum Breath over here shows up leading a bunch of injured stragglers through the forest. They needed a place to stay and since themayorgot captured, I elected myself de facto chief. The plan's to stay in here and eatBrown Meatuntil we run out, then I vote we eat the gnomes.
Hey! I'm short, not deaf!
Shh! Shh! Stress will make you chewy.
Grunkle Stan, we can't all just hide inside the Shack. There'sa townin need of saving. Me andFordtried to do it, but he got captured by Bill.

(Opens can of The Brown Meat)Serves that jerk right. My brother's had some stupid plans, but going up against an all-powerful space demon was his worst one yet. Trust me, we have everything we need right here.(Sits down on a wooden lounge chair surrounded by the Multi-Bear and gnomes)It's not the Ritz but at least the monsters inside know how to massage.(To the Multi-Bear:)You know Shiatsu?
Yes, I've taken some classes.
So you're really just gonna let Bill win?
Look, kiddo. We got a good deal here. Besides, I'm sure wherever the rest of the townsfolk are, they're fine.(Slams his hand down, accidentally hitting the remote and turning on the TV)

(On the TV:)This is Shandra Jimenez reporting live from the inside of Bill'scastle. Here for the first time are images of what's happened to the captured townsfolk. Viewers are advised to look away if they don't want to see their friends turned into a twisted throne of human agony.
MomandDad?
Myfamily!
Deputy Durland!
Is there no one who will save the people of this town? I'm Shandra Jimenez and I'm being turned into stone by a flying eyeball.(The TV turns to static)
Everyone gasps.
Oh, no. My parents are bad but eventheydon't deserve to be turned to stone.
(Drops down on his knees)Curse you, Bill! Why must you take everything we love?(Rips his shirt open and cries)
(Climbing on top of the Multi-Bear)Guys, don't you see? Our friends need us, but we can only save them if we fight back.(Pulls Dipper up after her)
Mabel is right. Billwantsus to run and hide. He wants us to think he's invincible. But Ford told me before he was captured that he knows Bill's secret weakness.
The refugees perk up and start muttering.
Weakness?
Now, if we band together, if we combine all of our strength, our smarts, our...whatever Toby has...
Various rashes!
...then we just might be able to rescue Ford, learn Bill's weakness, and save Gravity Falls!
Everyone cheers.
Whoa! Whoa! Whoa! Have you all forgotten who's in charge here? Besides, we're only safe inside! It's not like we can take the Mystery Shack to Bill.

Wha--Whoa! Holy hootenany! Flapjack and fiddlebanjos! Sorry, sorry. Got a little excited.(Thumps his foot and slaps his knee) What I meant to say is I think I figured out a way to fight Bill and rescue Ford, but we're all gonna have to work together.(Snaps his fingers and a gnome puts glasses on him)Now. If you just...

character: Dipper, Mabel, Soos, Wendy and McGucket
line: (Talk unintelligibly)
Don't worry, Ford! We're coming for you!
Cut to Ford being tranquilized at the Fearamid.
Let me go, you insane three-sided--! Wha--What is this place?(Pulls at a chain on his leg)
(Rises out of the floor, playing a piano and singing:)We'll meet again. Don't know where, don't know when. Oh, I know we'll meet again some sunny day.
Wh-where am I?

You're in the penthouse suite, kid! The tip of the pyramid. Have a drink.(Snaps his fingers and a martini glass appears in Ford's hand)Make yourself comfortable.(Takes a sip of his drink as Ford sits down)You know that couch is made from living human skin?
The couch groans as eyes, a nose, and a mouth appear. Ford jumps up.
Aaah! Quit the games, Cipher! If I'm still alive, you must want something from me.

Ah, sharp as ever, Fordsy. As you may have noticed...I've recently had a(Voice echoing:)multi-dimensional makeover.(Stops echoing and rearranges the room's furniture)I control space, matter, and now thatthat dumb baby's out of the way, time itself! But I wasn't always this way.(Everything falls to the floor)
Ooph!

You think those chains are tight?(Eye shows a planet on a two-dimensional plane, which burns)Imagine living inthe second dimension, flat minds in a flat world with flat dreams. I liberated my dimension, Stanford, and I'm here to liberate yours. There's just one hitch.(Eye projects a hologram of him pushing against the dome around Gravity Falls)As it turns out, my weirdness can't escape the magical confines of this town. There's something keeping me in.
Incredible! Gravity Falls'natural law of weirdness magnetism. I studied this years ago!
And did you find a way to undo it?
Of course. There's a simple equation that could collapse the barrier. But I'd never tell you!

Listen, Ford, if you just tell me that equation, finally your dimension will be free.(Projects himself drawing a smiley face in the midwest United States, then takes a bite out of the Earth and flies past his friends, who are destroying other planets, then to Ford, who is standing in the middle of a galaxy)Anything will be possible. I'll remake a fun world-- a better world! A party that never ends with a host that never dies! No more restrictions! No more laws! You'd be one of us. All-powerful. Greater than anything you've imagined! And all I need is your help.
You're insane if you think I'll help you.
